# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-104">Definities van entiteiten van het type Gevoelige informatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-105">Preventie van gegevensverlies (DLP) in het Compliancecentrum bevat veel typen gevoelige informatie die klaar zijn voor gebruik in uw DLP-beleid.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-106">In dit artikel worden al deze typen gevoelige informatie beschreven en wordt beschreven waar een DLP-beleid naar zoekt wanneer elk type wordt gedetecteerd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-106">This article lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-107">Zie Gevoelige informatietypen voor meer informatie over [gevoelige informatietypen.](sensitive-information-type-learn-about.md)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-107">To learn more about sensitive information types, see [Sensitive information types](sensitive-information-type-learn-about.md)</span></span>

## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-108">ABA-routeringsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-108">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-109">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-109">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-110">negen cijfers met een opgemaakt of niet-opgemaakt patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-110">nine digits that may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-111">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-111">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-112">Opgemaakt:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-112">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-113">vier cijfers beginnend met 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 of 8</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-113">four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-114">een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-114">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-115">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-115">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-116">een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-116">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-117">een cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-117">a digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-118">Niet-opgemaakt: negen opeenvolgende cijfers die beginnen met 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 of 8</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-118">Unformatted: nine consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-119">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-119">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-120">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-120">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-121">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-121">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-122">Een beleid heeft het medium vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-122">A policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-123">De functie Func_aba_routing inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-123">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-124">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_ABA_Routing gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-124">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-125">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-125">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-126">De functie Func_aba_routing inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-126">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- ABA Routing Number -->
    <Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-144">ArgentiniÃ« national identity (DNI) number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-144">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-145">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-145">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-146">Acht cijfers met of zonder perioden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-146">Eight digits with or without periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-147">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-147">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-148">Acht cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-148">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-149">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-149">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-150">een optionele periode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-150">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-151">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-151">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-152">een optionele periode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-152">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-153">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-153">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-154">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-154">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-155">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-155">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-156">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-156">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-157">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-157">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-158">De normale expressie Regex_argentina_national_id inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-158">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-159">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_argentina_national_id gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-159">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-unique-tax-identification-key-cuitcuil"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-171">Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-171">Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-172">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-172">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-173">Elf cijfers met streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-173">Eleven digits with dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-174">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-174">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-175">Elf cijfers met een streepje:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-175">Eleven digits with a dash:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-176">twee cijfers in 20, 23, 24, 27, 30, 33 of 34</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-176">two digits in 20, 23, 24, 27, 30, 33 or 34</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-177">een afbreekstreester (-)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-177">a hyphen (-)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-178">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-178">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-179">een afbreekstreester (-)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-179">a hyphen (-)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-180">een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-180">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-181">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-181">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-182">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-182">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-183">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-183">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-184">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-184">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-185">Met de `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-185">The function `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-186">Er wordt een `Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-186">A keyword from `Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-187">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-187">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-188">Met de `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-188">The function `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL) -->
      <Entity id="98da3da1-9199-4571-b7c4-b6522980b507" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-227">AustraliÃ« bankrekeningnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-227">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-228">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-228">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-229">zes tot tien cijfers met of zonder banknummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-229">six to ten digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-230">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-230">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-231">Accountnummer is 6 tot 10 cijfers.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-231">Account number is 6 to 10 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-232">Nummer van de australische bankstaat:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-232">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-233">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-233">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-234">een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-234">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-235">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-235">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-236">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-236">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-237">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-237">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-238">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-238">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-239">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-239">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-240">De normale expressie Regex_australia_bank_account_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-240">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-241">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_australia_bank_account_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-241">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-242">De normale expressie Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-242">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-243">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-243">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-244">De normale expressie Regex_australia_bank_account_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-244">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-245">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_australia_bank_account_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-245">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-329">AustraliÃ« rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-329">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-330">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-330">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-331">negen letters en cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-331">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-332">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-332">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-333">negen letters en cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-333">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-334">twee cijfers of letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-334">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-335">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-335">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-336">vijf cijfers of letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-336">five digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-337">OF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-337">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-338">een tot twee optionele letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-338">one to two optional letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-339">vier tot negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-339">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-340">OF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-340">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-341">negen cijfers of letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-341">nine digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-342">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-342">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-343">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-343">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-344">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-344">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-345">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-345">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-346">De normale expressie Regex_australia_drivers_license_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-346">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-347">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-347">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-348">Er wordt geen trefwoord Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-348">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-448">Nummer van medische rekening australiÃ«</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-448">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-449">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-449">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-450">10-11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-450">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-451">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-451">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-452">10-11 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-452">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-453">Het eerste cijfer is in het bereik 2-6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-453">First digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-454">Negen cijfers is een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-454">Nine digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-455">Tiende cijfer is het probleemcijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-455">Tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-456">Het elfde cijfer (optioneel) is het afzonderlijke getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-456">Eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-457">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-457">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-458">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-458">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-459">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-459">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-460">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-460">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-461">Met de Func_australian_medical_account_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-461">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-462">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-462">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-463">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-463">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-475">AustraliÃ« paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-475">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-476">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-476">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-477">Een letter gevolgd door zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-477">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-478">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-478">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-479">Een letter (niet zaakgevoelig) gevolgd door zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-479">A letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-480">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-480">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-481">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-481">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-482">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-482">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-483">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-483">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-484">De normale expressie Regex_australia_passport_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-484">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-485">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_passport of Keyword_australia_passport_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-485">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-519">AustraliÃ« belastingbestandsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-519">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-520">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-520">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-521">acht tot negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-521">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-522">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-522">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-523">acht tot negen cijfers die gewoonlijk spaties als volgt worden weergegeven:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-523">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-524">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-524">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-525">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-525">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-526">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-526">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-527">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-527">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-528">twee tot drie cijfers waarbij het laatste cijfer een controlecijfer is</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-528">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-529">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-529">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-530">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-530">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-531">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-531">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-532">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-532">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-533">De functie Func_australian_tax_file_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-533">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-534">Er wordt geen trefwoord Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number of Keyword_number_exclusions gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-534">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-535">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-535">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-540">hossinusheffing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-540">medicare levy</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-541">portfolionummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-541">portfolio number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-544">individuele belastingaangifte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-544">individual tax return</span></span>

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-547">Oostenrijks rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-547">Austria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-548">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-548">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-549">acht cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-549">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-550">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-550">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-551">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-551">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-552">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-552">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-553">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-553">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-554">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-554">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-555">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-555">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-556">Met de normale  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-556">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-557">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-557">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="682f18ce-44eb-482b-8198-2bcb96a0761e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-558">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-558">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-559">Keywords_eu_driver is s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-559">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-560">driverlic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-560">driverlic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-561">driverlics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-561">driverlics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-562">driverlicense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-562">driverlicense</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-564">driverlicence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-564">driverlicence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-565">driverlicences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-565">driverlicences</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-566">driver lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-566">driver lic</span></span>

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-684">Oostenrijk-identiteitskaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-684">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-685">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-685">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-686">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-686">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-687">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-687">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-688">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-688">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-689">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-689">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-690">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-690">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-691">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-691">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-692">Een combinatie van 24 tekens van letters, cijfers en speciale tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-692">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-693">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-693">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-694">24 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-694">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-695">22 letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig), cijfers, backslashes, slashes of plustekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-695">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-696">twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig), cijfers, backslashes, slashes, plustekens of gelijktekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-696">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-697">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-697">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-698">Niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-698">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-699">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-699">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-700">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-700">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-701">Met de normale  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-701">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-702">Er wordt een  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-702">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-708">Oostenrijks paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-708">Austria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-709">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-709">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-710">EÃ©n letter gevolgd door een optionele spatie en zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-710">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-711">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-711">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-712">Een combinatie van Ã©Ã©n letter, zeven cijfers en Ã©Ã©n spatie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-712">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-713">Ã©Ã©n letter (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-713">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-714">Ã©Ã©n spatie (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-714">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-715">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-715">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-716">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-716">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-717">niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-717">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-718">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-718">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-719">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-719">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-720">Met de normale  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-720">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-721">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-721">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-722">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de `Regex_eu_passport_date1` indeling DD.MM.YYYY of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden uit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-722">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-723">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-723">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-724">Met de normale  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-724">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-725">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-725">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1c96ae4e-303b-447d-86c7-77113ac266bf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-social-security-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-749">Oostenrijks sociaal-zekerheidsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-749">Austria social security number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-750">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-750">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-751">10 cijfers in de opgegeven notatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-751">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-752">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-752">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-753">10 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-753">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-754">drie cijfers die overeenkomen met een serieel getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-754">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-755">een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-755">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-756">zes cijfers die overeenkomen met de geboortedatum (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-756">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-757">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-757">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-758">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-758">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-759">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-759">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-760">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-760">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-761">Met de  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-761">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-762">een trefwoord  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` uit wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-762">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-763">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-763">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-764">Met de  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-764">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Social Security Number -->
      <Entity id="6896a906-86c9-4d19-a2da-6e43ccd19b7b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-783">soziale sicherheit kein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-783">soziale sicherheit kein</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-784">sozialesicherheitkein #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-784">sozialesicherheitkein#</span></span>

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-790">Oostenrijks btw-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-790">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-791">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-791">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-792">negen cijfers met optioneel afbreekstreester en schuine streep</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-792">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-793">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-793">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-794">negen cijfers met optioneel afbreekstreester en schuine streep vooruit:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-794">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-795">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-795">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-796">een afbreekstreester (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-796">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-797">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-797">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-798">a forward slash (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-798">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-799">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-799">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-800">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-800">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-801">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-801">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-802">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-802">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-803">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-803">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-804">Met de  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-804">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-805">Er wordt een  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-805">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-806">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-806">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-807">Met de  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-807">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
```

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-830">Oostenrijks belasting over toegevoegde waarde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-830">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-831">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-831">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-832">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-832">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-833">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-833">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-834">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-834">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-835">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-835">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-836">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-836">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-837">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-837">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-838">Alfanumeriek patroon van 11 tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-838">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-839">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-839">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-840">Alfanumeriek patroon van 11 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-840">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-841">A of een</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-841">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-842">T of t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-842">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-843">Optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-843">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-844">U of u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-844">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-845">optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-845">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-846">twee of drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-846">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-847">optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-847">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-848">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-848">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-849">optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-849">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-850">een of twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-850">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-851">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-851">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-852">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-852">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-853">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-853">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-854">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-854">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-855">Met de Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-855">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-856">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-856">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-857">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-857">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-858">Met de Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-858">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-876">Azure DocumentDB auth-toets</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-876">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-877">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-877">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-878">De tekenreeks 'DocumentDb', gevolgd door de tekens en tekenreeksen die in het onderstaande patroon worden beschreven.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-878">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-879">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-879">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-880">De tekenreeks 'DocumentDb'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-880">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-881">Een combinatie van 3-200 kleine of hoofdletters, cijfers, symbolen, speciale tekens of spaties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-881">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-882">Een groter dan symbool (>), een gelijkteken (=), een aanhalingsteken ("), of een apostrof (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-882">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-883">Elke combinatie van 86 kleine of hoofdletters, cijfers, slash (/) of plusteken (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-883">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-884">Twee gelijke tekens (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-884">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-885">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-885">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-886">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-886">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-887">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-887">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-888">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-888">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-889">De normale expressie CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-889">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-890">In de CEP_CommonExampleKeywords wordt geen inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-890">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-905">Azure IAAS-databaseverbindingsreeks en Azure SQL-verbindingsreeks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-905">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-906">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-906">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-907">De tekenreeks 'Server', 'server' of 'gegevensbron', gevolgd door de tekens en tekenreeksen die in het onderstaande patroon worden beschreven, inclusief de tekenreeks 'cloudapp.azure..</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-907">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-908">com' of 'cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-908">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-909">net" of "database.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-909">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-910">en de tekenreeks 'Wachtwoord' of 'wachtwoord' of 'pwd'.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-910">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-911">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-911">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-912">de tekenreeks 'Server', 'server' of 'gegevensbron'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-912">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-913">nul tot twee witruimtetekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-913">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-914">een gelijkteken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-914">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-915">nul tot twee witruimtetekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-915">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-916">een combinatie van 1-200 kleine of hoofdletters, cijfers, symbolen, speciale tekens of spaties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-916">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-917">De tekenreeks 'cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-917">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-918">com', 'cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-918">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-919">net", of "database.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-919">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-920">netto"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-920">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-921">een combinatie van 1-300 kleine of hoofdletters, cijfers, symbolen, speciale tekens of spaties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-921">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-922">de tekenreeks 'Wachtwoord', 'wachtwoord' of 'pwd'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-922">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>

```xml
        </Any>
```

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1048">Azure SAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1048">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1049">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1049">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1050">De tekenreeks 'sig' gevolgd door de tekens en tekenreeksen die in het onderstaande patroon worden beschreven.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1050">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1051">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1051">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1052">de tekenreeks 'sig'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1052">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1053">nul tot twee witruimtetekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1053">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1054">een gelijkteken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1054">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1055">nul tot twee witruimtetekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1055">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1056">een combinatie van 43-53 tekens die kleine of hoofdletters, cijfers of het procentteken (%)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1056">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1057">de tekenreeks '%3d'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1057">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1058">een teken dat geen kleine of hoofdletter, cijfer of procentteken (%) is</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1058">any character that isn't a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1059">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1059">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1060">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1060">No</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1062">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1062">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1063">De normale expressie CEP_Regex_AzureSAS inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1063">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1079">een gelijkteken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1079">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1080">nul tot twee witruimtetekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1080">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1142">Azure Storage accountcode (generic)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1142">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1143">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1143">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1144">Elke combinatie van 86 kleine of hoofdletters, cijfers, de slash (/) of het plusteken (+), voorafgegaan of gevolgd door de tekens die in het onderstaande patroon worden beschreven.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1144">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1145">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1145">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1146">nul tot een van de grootste symbolen (>), apostrof ('), gelijkteken (=), aanhalingsteken (") of getalteken (#)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1146">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1147">een combinatie van 86 tekens die kleine of hoofdletters, cijfers, de slash (/) of het plusteken (+) zijn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1147">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1148">twee gelijke tekens (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1148">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1149">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1149">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1150">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1150">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1151">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1151">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1152">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1152">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1153">De normale expressie CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1153">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1154">Nummer van het Rijbewijs van BelgiÃ«</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1154">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1155">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1155">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1156">10 cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1156">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1157">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1157">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1158">10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1158">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1159">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1159">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1160">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1160">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1161">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1161">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1162">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1162">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1163">Met de normale  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1163">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1164">Een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1164">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Belgium Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d89fd329-9324-433c-b687-2c37bd5166f3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
