## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1297">Nationaal nummer belgiÃ«</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1297">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1298">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1298">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1299">11 cijfers plus optionele scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1299">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1300">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1300">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1301">11 cijfers plus scheidingstekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1301">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1302">zes cijfers en twee optionele perioden in de notatie YY. MM.DD voor geboortedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1302">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1303">Een optioneel scheidingsteken van punt, streepje, spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1303">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1304">drie opeenvolgende cijfers (oneven voor mannen, zelfs voor vrouwen)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1304">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1305">Een optioneel scheidingsteken van punt, streepje, spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1305">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1306">twee controlecijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1306">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1307">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1307">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1308">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1308">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1309">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1309">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1310">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1310">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1311">De functie Func_belgium_national_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1311">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1312">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_belgium_national_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1312">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1313">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1313">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1314">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1314">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1315">De functie Func_belgium_national_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1315">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1316">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1316">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1375">BelgiÃ« paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1375">Belgium passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1376">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1376">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1377">twee letters gevolgd door zes cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1377">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1378">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1378">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1379">twee letters en gevolgd door zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1379">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1380">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1380">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1381">niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1381">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1382">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1382">Definition</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1383">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1383">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1384">Met de normale  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1384">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1385">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1385">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1386">Met de normale `Regex_eu_passport_date2` expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de indeling DD MM YY of een trefwoord van of wordt `Keywords_eu_passport_date` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1386">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1387">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1387">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1388">Met de normale  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1388">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1389">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1389">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d7b1315b-21ca-4774-a32a-596010ff78fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1416">BelgiÃ« btw-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1416">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1417">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1417">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1418">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1418">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1419">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1419">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1420">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1420">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1421">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1421">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1422">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1422">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1423">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1423">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1424">Alfanumeriek patroon van 12 tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1424">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1425">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1425">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1426">Alfanumeriek patroon van 12 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1426">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1427">een letter B of b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1427">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1428">een letter E of e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1428">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1429">een cijfer 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1429">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1430">een cijfer van 1 tot en met 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1430">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1431">een optionele punt of afbreekstreester of spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1431">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1432">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1432">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1433">een optionele punt of afbreekstreester of spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1433">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1434">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1434">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1435">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1435">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1436">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1436">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1437">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1437">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1438">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1438">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1439">De functie Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1439">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1440">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1440">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1441">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1441">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1442">De functie Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1442">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1454">BraziliÃ« CPF-getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1454">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1455">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1455">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1456">11 cijfers die een controlecijfer bevatten en kunnen worden opgemaakt of niet-opgemaakt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1456">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1457">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1457">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1458">Opgemaakt:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1458">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1459">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1459">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1460">een punt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1460">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1461">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1461">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1462">een punt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1462">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1463">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1463">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1464">een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1464">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1465">twee cijfers die cijfers controleren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1465">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1466">Niet-opgemaakt:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1466">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1467">11 cijfers waarbij de laatste twee cijfers controlecijfers zijn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1467">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1468">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1468">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1469">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1469">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1470">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1470">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1471">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1471">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1472">De functie Func_brazil_cpf inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1472">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1473">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_brazil_cpf gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1473">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1474">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1474">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1475">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1475">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1476">De functie Func_brazil_cpf inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1476">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1477">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1477">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1478">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1478">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_cpf"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1479">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1479">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1489">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1489">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1490">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1490">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1491">14 cijfers met een registratienummer, vertakkingsnummer en controlecijfers, plus scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1491">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1492">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1492">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1493">14 cijfers, plus scheidingstekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1493">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1494">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1494">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1495">een punt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1495">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1496">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1496">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1497">een punt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1497">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1498">drie cijfers (deze eerste acht cijfers zijn het registratienummer)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1498">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1499">een slash naar voren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1499">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1500">vertakkingsnummer met vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1500">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1501">een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1501">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1502">twee cijfers die cijfers controleren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1502">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1503">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1503">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1504">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1504">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1505">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1505">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1506">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1506">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1507">Met de Func_brazil_cnpj wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1507">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1508">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_brazil_cnpj gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1508">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1509">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1509">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1510">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1510">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1511">Met de Func_brazil_cnpj wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1511">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1512">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1512">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1534">BraziliÃ« National Identification Card (RG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1534">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1535">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1535">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1536">Registro Geral (oude notatie): Negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1536">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1537">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (nieuwe indeling): 11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1537">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1538">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1538">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1539">Registro Geral (oude indeling):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1539">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1540">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1540">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1541">een punt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1541">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1542">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1542">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1543">een punt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1543">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1544">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1544">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1545">een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1545">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1546">een cijfer dat een controlecijfer is</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1546">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1547">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (nieuwe indeling):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1547">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1548">10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1548">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1549">een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1549">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1550">een cijfer dat een controlecijfer is</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1550">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1551">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1551">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1552">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1552">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1553">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1553">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1554">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1554">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1555">Met de Func_brazil_rg wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1555">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1556">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_brazil_rg gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1556">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1557">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1557">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
      <Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1568">Bulgarije rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1568">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1569">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1569">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1570">negen cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1570">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1571">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1571">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1572">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1572">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1573">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1573">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1574">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1574">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1575">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1575">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1576">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1576">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1577">Met de normale  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1577">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1578">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1578">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="66d39258-94c2-43b2-804b-aa312258e54b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1705">Een uniform burgerlijk burgernummer van Bulgarije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1705">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1706">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1706">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1707">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1707">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1708">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1708">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1709">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1709">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1710">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1710">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1711">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1711">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1712">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1712">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1713">10 cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1713">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1714">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1714">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1715">10 cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1715">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1716">zes cijfers die overeenkomen met de geboortedatum (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1716">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1717">twee cijfers die overeenkomen met de geboortedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1717">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1718">Ã©Ã©n cijfer dat overeenkomt met geslacht: een even cijfer voor man en een oneven cijfer voor vrouw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1718">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1719">een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1719">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1720">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1720">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1721">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1721">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1722">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1722">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1723">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1723">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1724">Met de  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1724">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1725">Er wordt een  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1725">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1726">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1726">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1727">Met de  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1727">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1772">Bulgarije paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1772">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1773">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1773">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1774">negen cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1774">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1775">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1775">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1776">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1776">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1777">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1777">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1778">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1778">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1779">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1779">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1780">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1780">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1781">Met de normale  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1781">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1782">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1782">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1783">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de `Regex_eu_passport_date1` indeling DD.MM.YYYY of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden uit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1783">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1784">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1784">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1785">Met de normale  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1785">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1786">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1786">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="f7172b82-c588-4216-845e-4e54e397f29a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1806">Canada bankrekeningnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1806">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1807">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1807">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1808">7 of 12 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1808">7 or 12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1809">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1809">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1810">Een Canada-bankrekeningnummer is 7 of 12 cijfers.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1810">A Canada Bank Account Number is 7 or 12 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1811">Een transitnummer van een Canadese bankrekening is:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1811">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1812">vijf cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1812">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1813">een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1813">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1814">drie cijfers OF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1814">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1815">een nul "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1815">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1816">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1816">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1817">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1817">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1818">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1818">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1819">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1819">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1820">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1820">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1821">De normale expressie Regex_canada_bank_account_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1821">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1822">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_canada_bank_account_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1822">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1823">De normale expressie Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1823">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1824">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1824">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1825">De normale expressie Regex_canada_bank_account_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1825">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1826">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_canada_bank_account_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1826">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1850">Canada-nummer van het rijbewijs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1850">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1851">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1851">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1852">Verschilt per provincie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1852">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1853">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1853">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1854">Verschillende patronen voor Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec en Saskatchewan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1854">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1855">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1855">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1856">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1856">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1857">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1857">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1858">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1858">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1859">De functie Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1859">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1860">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1860">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1861">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_canada_drivers_license gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1861">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1997">Canada health service number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1997">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1998">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1998">Format</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-1999">10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-1999">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2000">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2000">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2001">10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2001">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2002">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2002">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2003">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2003">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2004">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2004">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2005">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2005">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2006">De normale expressie Regex_canada_health_service_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2006">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2007">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_canada_health_service_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2007">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2019">Canada-paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2019">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2020">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2020">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2021">twee hoofdletters gevolgd door zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2021">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2022">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2022">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2023">twee hoofdletters gevolgd door zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2023">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2024">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2024">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2025">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2025">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2026">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2026">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2027">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2027">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2028">De normale expressie Regex_canada_passport_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2028">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2029">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_canada_passport_number of Keyword_passport gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2029">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2059">Canada Personal Health Identification Number (PHIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2059">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2060">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2060">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2061">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2061">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2062">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2062">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2063">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2063">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2064">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2064">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2065">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2065">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2066">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2066">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2067">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2067">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2068">De normale expressie Regex_canada_phin inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2068">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2069">Er worden ten minste twee trefwoorden Keyword_canada_phin of Keyword_canada_provinces gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2069">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2102">Canada social insurance number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2102">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2103">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2103">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2104">negen cijfers met optionele afbreekstree streepjes of spaties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2104">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2105">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2105">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2106">Opgemaakt:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2106">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2107">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2107">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2108">een afbreekstreester of spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2108">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2109">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2109">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2110">een afbreekstreester of spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2110">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2111">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2111">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2112">Niet-opgemaakt: negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2112">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2113">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2113">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2114">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2114">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2115">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2115">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2116">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2116">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2117">De functie Func_canadian_sin inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2117">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2118">Ten minste twee van de volgende combinaties:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2118">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2119">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_sin gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2119">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2120">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_sin_collaborative gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2120">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2121">Met de Func_eu_date wordt een datum in de juiste datumnotatie gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2121">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2122">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2122">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2123">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2123">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2124">De functie Func_unformatted_canadian_sin inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2124">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2125">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_sin gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2125">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2126">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2126">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2151">Chili-identiteitskaartnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2151">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2152">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2152">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2153">zeven tot acht cijfers plus scheidingstekens van een vinkje of letter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2153">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2154">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2154">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2155">zeven tot acht cijfers plus scheidingstekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2155">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2156">Ã©Ã©n tot twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2156">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2157">een optionele periode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2157">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2158">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2158">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2159">een optionele periode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2159">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2160">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2160">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2161">een streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2161">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2162">een cijfer of letter (niet case-sensitive) dat is een controlecijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2162">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2163">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2163">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2164">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2164">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2165">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2165">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2166">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2166">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2167">De functie Func_chile_id_card inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2167">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2168">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_chile_id_card gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2168">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2169">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2169">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2170">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2170">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2209">China Resident Identity Card (PRC) number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2209">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2210">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2210">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2211">18 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2211">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2212">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2212">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2213">18 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2213">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2214">zes cijfers die een adrescode zijn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2214">six digits that are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2215">acht cijfers in het formulier YYYYMMDD, de geboortedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2215">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2216">drie cijfers die een ordercode zijn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2216">three digits that are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2217">een cijfer dat een controlecijfer is</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2217">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2218">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2218">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2219">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2219">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2220">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2220">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2221">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2221">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2222">De functie Func_china_resident_id inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2222">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2223">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_china_resident_id gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2223">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2224">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2224">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2225">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2225">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2226">De functie Func_china_resident_id inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2226">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2227">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2227">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2240">Creditcardnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2240">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2241">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2241">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2242">14 tot 16 cijfers die kunnen worden opgemaakt of niet-opgemaakt (dddddd) en die de Luhn-toets moeten doorstaan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2242">14 to 16 digits that can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and that must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2243">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2243">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2244">Complex en robuust patroon dat kaarten van alle grote merken wereldwijd detecteert, waaronder Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, cadeaukaarten en dinerkaarten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2244">Complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2245">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2245">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2246">Ja, de Luhn-checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2246">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2247">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2247">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2248">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2248">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2249">De functie Func_credit_card inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2249">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2250">Een van de volgende gegevens is waar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2250">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2251">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_cc_verification gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2251">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2252">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_cc_name gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2252">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2253">Met de Func_expiration_date wordt een datum in de juiste datumnotatie gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2253">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2254">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2254">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2255">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2255">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2256">De functie Func_credit_card inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2256">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2257">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2257">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2517">Nummer van het rijbewijs van KroatiÃ«</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2517">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2518">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2518">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2519">acht cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2519">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2520">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2520">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2521">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2521">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2522">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2522">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2523">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2523">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2524">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2524">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2525">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2525">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2526">Met de normale  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2526">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2527">Een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2527">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="005b3ef1-47dd-4e68-bb02-c6db484d00f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
