- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2650">vozaÄke dozvole</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2650">vozaÄke dozvole</span></span>


## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2651">Nummer van kroatische identiteitskaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2651">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2652">Deze entiteit van het type gevoelige informatie maakt deel uit van het eu-nationale identificatienummer voor gevoelige informatie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2652">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2653">Het is beschikbaar als een op zichzelf staand entiteit met gevoelige informatie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2653">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2654">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2654">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2655">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2655">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2656">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2656">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2657">negen opeenvolgende cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2657">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2658">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2658">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2659">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2659">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2660">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2660">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2661">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2661">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2662">Met de Func_croatia_id_card wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2662">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2663">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_croatia_id_card gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2663">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2694">KroatiÃ«-paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2694">Croatia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2695">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2696">negen cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2696">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2697">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2697">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2698">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2698">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2699">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2699">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2700">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2700">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2701">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2701">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2702">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2702">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2703">Met de normale  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2703">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2704">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2704">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2705">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de `Regex_eu_passport_date1` indeling DD.MM.YYYY of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden uit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2705">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2706">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2706">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2707">Met de normale  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2707">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2708">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2708">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Croatia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7d7a729d-32d8-4204-8d01-d5e6a6c25581" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2726">OIB-nummer (Persoonlijke identificatie van KroatiÃ«)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2726">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2727">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2727">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2728">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2728">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2729">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2729">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2730">11 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2730">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2731">10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2731">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2732">laatste cijfer is een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2732">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2733">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2733">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2734">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2734">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2735">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2735">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2736">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2736">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2737">De functie Func_croatia_oib_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2737">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2738">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2738">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2739">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2739">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2740">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2740">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2741">De functie Func_croatia_oib_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2741">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2742">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2742">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2773">Cyprus drivers license number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2773">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2774">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2774">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2775">12 cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2775">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2776">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2776">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2777">12 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2777">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2778">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2778">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2779">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2779">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2780">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2780">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2781">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2781">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2782">Met de normale  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2782">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2783">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2783">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="356fa104-f9ac-4aff-a0e4-2e6e65ea06c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2908">Cyprus-identiteitskaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2908">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2909">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2909">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2910">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2910">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2911">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2911">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2912">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2912">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2913">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2913">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2914">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2914">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2915">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2915">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2916">10 cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2916">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2917">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2917">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2918">10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2918">10 digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2919">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2919">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2920">niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2920">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2921">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2921">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2922">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2922">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2923">Met de normale  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2923">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2924">Er wordt een  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2924">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2933">Cyprus paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2933">Cyprus passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2934">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2934">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2935">een letter gevolgd door 6-8 cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2935">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2936">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2936">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2937">een letter gevolgd door zes tot acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2937">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2938">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2938">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2939">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2939">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2940">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2940">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2941">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2941">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2942">Met de normale  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2942">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2943">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2943">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2944">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` indeling DD/MM/YYYY of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` gevonden uit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2944">The regular expression `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD/MM/YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2945">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2945">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2946">Met de normale  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2946">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2947">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2947">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>  
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="9193e2e8-7f8c-43c1-a274-ac40d651936f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2976">Btw-nummer cyprus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2976">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2977">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2977">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2978">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2978">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2979">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2979">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2980">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2980">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2981">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2981">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2982">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2982">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2983">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2983">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2984">acht cijfers en Ã©Ã©n letter in het opgegeven patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2984">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2985">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2985">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2986">acht cijfers en Ã©Ã©n letter:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2986">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2987">een '0' of '9'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2987">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2988">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2988">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2989">Ã©Ã©n letter (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2989">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2990">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2990">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2991">niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2991">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2992">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2992">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2993">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2993">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2994">Met de  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2994">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2995">Er wordt een  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2995">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2996">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2996">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-2997">Met de  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-2997">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3025">Tsjechisch rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3025">Czech driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3026">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3026">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3027">twee letters gevolgd door zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3027">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3028">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3028">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3029">acht letters en cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3029">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3030">letter 'E' (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3030">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3031">een brief</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3031">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3032">een spatie (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3032">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3033">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3033">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3034">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3034">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3035">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3035">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3036">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3036">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3037">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3037">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3038">Met de normale  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3038">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3039">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3039">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3165">Tsjechisch paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3165">Czech passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3166">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3166">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3167">acht cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3167">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3168">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3168">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3169">acht cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3169">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3170">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3170">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3171">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3171">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3172">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3172">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3173">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3173">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3174">Met de normale  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3174">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3175">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3175">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3176">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de `Regex_eu_passport_date1` indeling DD.MM.YYYY of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden uit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3176">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3177">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3177">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3178">Met de normale  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3178">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3179">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3179">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Czech Republic Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7bcd8ce8-5e92-4bbe-bc92-fa669f0369fa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3201">Tsjechisch persoonlijk identiteitsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3201">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3202">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3202">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3203">negen cijfers met optionele slash (oude opmaak) 10 cijfers met optionele slash vooruit (nieuwe indeling)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3203">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) 10 digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3204">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3204">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3205">negen cijfers (oude notatie):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3205">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3206">zes cijfers die de geboortedatum vertegenwoordigen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3206">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3207">een optionele slash</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3207">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3208">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3208">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3209">10 cijfers (nieuwe indeling):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3209">10 digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3210">zes cijfers die de geboortedatum vertegenwoordigen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3210">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3211">een optionele slash</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3211">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3212">vier cijfers waarbij het laatste cijfer een controlecijfer is</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3212">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3213">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3213">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3214">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3214">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3215">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3215">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3216">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3216">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3217">De functie Func_czech_id_card inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3217">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3218">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_czech_id_card gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3218">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3219">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3219">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3220">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3220">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3221">De functie Func_czech_id_card_new_format inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3221">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3222">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3222">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3269">Het rijbewijsnummer van Denemarken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3269">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3270">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3270">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3271">acht cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3271">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3272">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3272">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3273">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3273">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3274">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3274">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3275">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3275">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3276">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3276">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3277">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3277">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3278">Met de normale  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3278">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3279">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3279">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3403">Denemarken paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3403">Denmark passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3404">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3404">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3405">negen cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3405">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3406">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3406">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3407">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3407">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3408">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3408">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3409">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3409">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3410">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3410">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3411">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3411">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3412">Met de normale  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3412">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3413">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3413">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3414">Met de normale `Regex_eu_passport_date2` expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de indeling DD MM YY of wordt een trefwoord uit `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3414">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3415">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3415">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3416">Met de normale  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3416">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3417">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3417">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="25e8c47e-e6fe-4884-a211-74898f8c0196" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3437">Persoonlijk identificatienummer van Denemarken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3437">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3438">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3438">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3439">10 cijfers met een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3439">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3440">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3440">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3441">10 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3441">10 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3442">zes cijfers in de indeling DDMMYY, de geboortedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3442">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3443">een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3443">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3444">vier cijfers waarbij het uiteindelijke cijfer een controlecijfer is</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3444">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3445">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3445">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3446">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3446">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3447">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3447">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3448">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3448">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3449">De normale expressie Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3449">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3450">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_denmark_id gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3450">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3451">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3451">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3452">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3452">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3453">De normale expressie Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3453">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3454">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3454">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3526">Nummer van Het Bureau voor drugshandhaving (DEA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3526">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3527">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3527">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3528">twee letters gevolgd door zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3528">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3529">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3529">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3530">Patroon moet de volgende gegevens bevatten:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3530">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3531">Ã©Ã©n letter (niet hoofdlettergevoelig) van deze set mogelijke letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, een registrantcode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3531">one letter (not case-sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3532">Ã©Ã©n letter (niet zaakgevoelig), de eerste letter van de achternaam of het cijfer '9' van de registrant</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3532">one letter (not case-sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name or digit '9'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3533">zeven cijfers, waarvan het laatste het controlecijfer is</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3533">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3534">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3534">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3535">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3535">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3536">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3536">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3537">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3537">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3538">Met de Func_dea_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3538">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3539">Er wordt een `Keyword_dea_number` trefwoord uit gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3539">A keyword from `Keyword_dea_number` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3540">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3540">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3541">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3541">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3542">Met de Func_dea_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3542">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3543">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3543">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- DEA Number -->
    <Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.1207.000" maxEngineVersion="15.20.3134.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3135.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3544">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3544">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_dea_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3545">Keyword_dea_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3545">Keyword_dea_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3546">dea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3546">dea</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3547">dea #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3547">dea#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3548">beheer van drugshandhaving</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3548">drug enforcement administration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3549">instantie voor drugshandhaving</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3549">drug enforcement agency</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3550">Estlands rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3550">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3551">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3551">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3552">twee letters gevolgd door zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3552">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3553">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3553">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3554">twee letters en zes cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3554">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3555">de letters 'ET' (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3555">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3556">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3556">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3557">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3557">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3558">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3558">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3559">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3559">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3560">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3560">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3561">Met de normale  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3561">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3562">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3562">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="51da8171-da70-4cc1-9d65-055a59ca4f83" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3688">Estlandse persoonlijke identificatiecode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3688">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3689">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3689">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3690">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3690">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3691">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3691">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3692">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3692">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3693">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3693">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3694">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3694">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3695">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3696">11 cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3696">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3697">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3697">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3698">11 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3698">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3699">een cijfer dat overeenkomt met geslacht en eeuw van geboorte (oneven getal man, even getal vrouw; 1-2: 19e eeuw; 3-4: 20e eeuw; 5-6: 21e eeuw)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3699">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3700">zes cijfers die overeenkomen met de geboortedatum (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3700">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3701">drie cijfers die overeenkomen met een serieel getal dat personen scheidt die op dezelfde datum zijn geboren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3701">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3702">een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3702">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3703">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3703">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3704">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3704">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3705">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3705">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3706">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3706">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3707">Met de  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3707">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3708">Er wordt een  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3708">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3709">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3709">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3710">Met de  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3710">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3711">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3711">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3712">Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3712">Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3713">id-kaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3713">id-kaart</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3714">ik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3714">ik</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3715">isikukood #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3715">isikukood#</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3743">Estlands paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3743">Estonia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3744">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3744">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3745">Ã©Ã©n letter gevolgd door zeven cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3745">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3746">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3746">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3747">Ã©Ã©n letter gevolgd door zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3747">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3748">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3748">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3749">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3749">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3750">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3750">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3751">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3751">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3752">Met de normale  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3752">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3753">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3753">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3754">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de `Regex_eu_passport_date1` indeling DD.MM.YYYY of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden uit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3754">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3755">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3755">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3756">Met de normale  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3756">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3757">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3757">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61f7073a-509e-425b-a754-bc01bb5d5b8c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3775">EU-betaalkaartnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3775">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3776">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3776">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3777">16 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3777">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3778">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3778">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3779">Complex en robuust patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3779">Complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3780">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3780">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3781">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3781">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3782">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3782">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3783">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3783">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3784">Met de Func_eu_debit_card wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3784">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3785">Ten minste een van de volgende gegevens is waar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3785">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3786">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_eu_debit_card gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3786">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3787">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_card_terms_dict gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3787">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3788">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_card_security_terms_dict gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3788">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3789">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3789">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3790">Met de Func_expiration_date wordt een datum in de juiste datumnotatie gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3790">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-3791">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-3791">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```
