## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4238">Finland-nummer van het rijbewijs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4238">Finland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4239">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4239">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4240">10 cijfers met een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4240">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4241">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4241">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4242">10 cijfers met een afbreekstreester:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4242">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4243">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4243">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4244">een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4244">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4245">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4245">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4246">een cijfer of letter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4246">a digit or letter</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4247">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4247">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4248">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4248">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4249">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4249">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4250">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4250">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4251">Met de normale  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4251">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4252">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4252">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Finland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="bb3b27a3-79bd-4ac4-81a7-f9fca3c7d1a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4383">Finland European Health Insurance Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4383">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4384">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4384">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4385">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4385">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4386">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4386">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4387">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4387">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4388">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4388">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4389">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4389">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4390">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4390">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4391">20-cijferig getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4391">20-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4392">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4392">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4393">20-cijferig getal:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4393">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4394">10 cijfers - 8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4394">10 digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4395">een optionele spatie of afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4395">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4396">10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4396">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4397">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4397">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4398">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4398">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4399">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4399">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4400">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4400">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4401">In de regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4401">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4402">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4402">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4420">Nationale finland-id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4420">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4421">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4421">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4422">zes cijfers plus een teken dat een eeuw plus drie cijfers plus een vinkje aangeeft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4422">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4423">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4423">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4424">Patroon moet de volgende gegevens bevatten:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4424">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4425">zes cijfers in de indeling DDMMYY, een geboortedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4425">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4426">century marker ('-', '+' of 'a')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4426">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4427">persoonlijk identificatienummer met drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4427">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4428">een cijfer of letter (case insensitive) dat een controlecijfer is</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4428">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4429">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4429">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4430">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4430">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4431">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4431">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4432">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4432">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4433">de functie Func_finnish_national_id inhoud vindt die overeenkomt met het patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4433">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4434">een trefwoord uit Keyword_finnish_national_id wordt gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4434">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4435">de checksum passeert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4435">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4436">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4436">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4437">de functie Func_finnish_national_id inhoud vindt die overeenkomt met het patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4437">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4438">de checksum passeert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4438">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4487">Finland paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4487">Finland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4488">Deze entiteit van het type gevoelige informatie is beschikbaar in het type gevoelige informatie van het EU-paspoortnummer en is beschikbaar als een op zichzelf staand entiteit van het type gevoelige informatie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4488">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4489">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4489">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4490">combinatie van negen letters en cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4490">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4491">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4491">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4492">combinatie van negen letters en cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4492">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4493">twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4493">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4494">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4494">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4495">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4495">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4496">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4496">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4497">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4497">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4498">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4498">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4499">Met de normale `Regex_finland_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4499">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4500">Een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keyword_finland_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4500">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4501">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de `Regex_eu_passport_date1` indeling DD.MM.YYYY of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden uit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4501">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4502">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4502">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4503">Met de normale `Regex_finland_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4503">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4504">Een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keyword_finland_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4504">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4528">Rijbewijsnummer van Frankrijk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4528">France driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4529">Deze entiteit van het type gevoelige informatie is beschikbaar in het type gevoelige informatie over het EU-rijbewijsnummer en is beschikbaar als een op zichzelf staand entiteit met gevoelige informatie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4529">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4530">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4530">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4531">12 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4531">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4532">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4532">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4533">12 cijfers met validatie om vergelijkbare patronen, zoals Franse telefoonnummers, te korting te geven</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4533">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4534">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4534">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4535">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4535">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4536">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4536">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4537">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4537">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4538">de functie Func_french_drivers_license inhoud vindt die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4538">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4539">een trefwoord uit Keyword_french_drivers_license wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4539">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4666">Frankrijk gezondheidsverzekeringsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4666">France health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4667">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4667">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4668">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4668">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4669">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4669">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4670">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4670">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4671">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4671">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4672">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4672">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4673">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4673">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4674">21-cijferig getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4674">21-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4675">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4675">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4676">21-cijferig getal:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4676">21-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4677">10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4677">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4678">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4678">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4679">10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4679">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4680">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4680">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4681">een cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4681">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4682">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4682">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4683">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4683">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4684">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4684">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4685">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4685">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4686">de regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4686">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4687">een trefwoord uit Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4687">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4688">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4688">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4689">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4689">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4690">verzekeringskaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4690">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4691">carte vitaal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4691">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4692">carte d'assurÃ© sociaal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4692">carte d'assurÃ© social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4693">Franse nationale id-kaart (CNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4693">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4694">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4694">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4695">12 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4695">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4696">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4696">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4697">12 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4697">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4698">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4698">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4699">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4699">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4700">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4700">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4701">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4701">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4702">De normale expressie Regex_france_cni inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4702">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4703">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4703">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4704">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4704">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4705">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4705">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4706">kaartnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4706">card number</span></span>

## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4717">Frankrijk paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4717">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4718">Deze entiteit van het type gevoelige informatie is beschikbaar in het gevoelige informatietype EU-paspoortnummer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4718">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4719">Het is beschikbaar als een op zichzelf staand entiteit met gevoelige informatie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4719">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4720">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4720">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4721">negen cijfers en letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4721">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4722">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4722">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4723">negen cijfers en letters:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4723">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4724">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4724">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4725">twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4725">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4726">vijf cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4726">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4727">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4727">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4728">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4728">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4729">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4729">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4730">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4730">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4731">Met de `Func_fr_passport` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4731">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4732">Een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4732">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4733">Met de normale `Regex_eu_passport_date3` expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de indeling DD MM YYYY of wordt een trefwoord van `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4733">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4734">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4734">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4735">Met de `Func_fr_passport` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4735">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4736">Een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4736">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- France Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4767">Frankrijkse socialezekerheidsnummer (INSEE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4767">France social security number (INSEE)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4768">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4768">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4769">15 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4769">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4770">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4770">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4771">Moet overeenkomen met een van de twee patronen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4771">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4772">13 cijfers gevolgd door een spatie gevolgd door twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4772">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4773">of</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4773">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4774">15 opeenvolgende cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4774">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4775">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4775">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4776">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4776">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4777">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4777">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4778">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4778">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4779">Met de `Func_french_insee` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4779">The function `Func_french_insee` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4780">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_fr_insee gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4780">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4781">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4781">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4782">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4782">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4783">Met de functie Func_french_insee of Func_fr_insee wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4783">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4784">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4784">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France INSEE -->
    <Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4815">Frankrijk btw-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4815">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4816">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4816">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4817">13 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4817">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4818">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4818">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4832">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4832">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4833">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4833">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4834">Met de  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4834">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4835">Er wordt een  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4835">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4836">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4836">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4837">Met de  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4837">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numÃ©ro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4857">Frankrijk btw-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4857">France value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4864">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4864">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4866">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4866">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4867">Alfanumeriek patroon van 13 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4867">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4868">twee letters - FR (hoofdletters ongevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4868">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4870">twee letters of cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4870">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4871">een optionele spatie, punt, afbreekstreester of komma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4871">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4872">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4872">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4873">een optionele spatie, punt, afbreekstreester of komma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4873">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4874">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4874">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4875">een optionele spatie, punt, afbreekstreester of komma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4875">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4876">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4876">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4877">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4877">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4878">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4878">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4879">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4879">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4880">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4880">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4881">Met de Func_france_value_added_tax_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4881">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4882">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4882">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4883">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4883">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4884">Met de Func_france_value_added_tax_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4884">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4897">Het rijbewijsnummer van Duitsland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4897">Germany driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4898">Deze entiteit van het type gevoelige informatie is opgenomen in het gevoelige informatietype EU-rijbewijsnummer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4898">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4899">Het is beschikbaar als een op zichzelf staand entiteit met gevoelige informatie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4899">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4900">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4900">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4901">combinatie van 11 cijfers en letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4901">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4902">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4902">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4903">11 cijfers en letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4903">11 digits and letters (not case-sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4904">een cijfer of letter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4904">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4905">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4905">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4906">zes cijfers of letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4906">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4907">een cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4907">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4908">een cijfer of letter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4908">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4909">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4909">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4910">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4910">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4911">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4911">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4912">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4912">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4913">De functie Func_german_drivers_license inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4913">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4914">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_german_drivers_license_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4914">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-4915">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-4915">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5064">Duitsland-identiteitskaartnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5064">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5065">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5065">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5066">sinds 1 november 2010: Negen letters en cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5066">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5067">van 1 april 1987 tot en met 31 oktober 2010: 10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5067">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5068">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5068">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5069">sinds 1 november 2010:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5069">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5070">Ã©Ã©n letter (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5070">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5071">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5071">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5072">van 1 april 1987 tot en met 31 oktober 2010:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5072">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5073">10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5073">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5074">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5074">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5075">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5075">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5076">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5076">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5077">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5077">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5078">De normale expressie Regex_germany_id_card inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5078">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5079">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_germany_id_card gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5079">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5084">identificatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5084">identification</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5093">persÃ¶nliche identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5093">persoÌnliche identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5094">persÃ¶nliche-id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5094">persoÌnliche-id-nummer</span></span>


## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5095">Duitsland paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5095">Germany passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5096">Deze entiteit van het type gevoelige informatie is opgenomen in het type gevoelige informatie van het EU-paspoortnummer en is beschikbaar als een op zichzelf staand entiteit met gevoelige informatie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5096">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5097">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5097">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5098">10 cijfers of letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5098">10 digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5099">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5099">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5100">Patroon moet de volgende gegevens bevatten:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5100">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5101">eerste teken is een cijfer of een letter uit deze set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5101">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5102">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5102">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5103">vijf cijfers of letters uit deze set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5103">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5104">een cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5104">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5105">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5105">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5106">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5106">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5107">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5107">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5108">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5108">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5109">De functie Func_german_passport inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5109">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5110">Een trefwoord `Keyword_german_passport` van of `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5110">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5111">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5111">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5112">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5112">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5113">De functie Func_german_passport_data inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5113">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5114">Een trefwoord `Keyword_german_passport` van of `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5114">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5115">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5115">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5138">Btw-nummer duitsland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5138">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5139">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5139">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5140">11 cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5140">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5141">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5141">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5142">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5142">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5143">Twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5143">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5144">Een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5144">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5145">Drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5145">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5146">Een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5146">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5147">Drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5147">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5148">Een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5148">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5149">Twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5149">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5150">een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5150">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5151">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5151">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5152">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5152">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5153">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5153">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5154">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5154">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5155">Met de  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5155">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5156">Er wordt een  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5156">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5157">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5157">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5158">Met de  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5158">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5159">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5159">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5160">Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5160">Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5163">steueridentifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5163">steueridentifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5164">steuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5164">steuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5165">belasting-id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5165">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5166">geen belastingidentificatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5166">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5167">btw-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5167">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5168">belasting nee #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5168">tax no#</span></span>

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5184">Duitsland btw-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5184">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5185">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5185">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5186">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5186">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5187">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5187">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5188">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5188">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5189">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5189">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5190">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5190">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5191">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5191">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5192">Alfanumeriek patroon van 11 tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5192">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5193">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5193">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5194">Alfanumeriek patroon van 11 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5194">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5195">een letter D of d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5195">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5196">een letter E of e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5196">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5197">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5197">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5198">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5198">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5199">een optionele spatie of komma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5199">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5200">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5200">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5201">een optionele spatie of komma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5201">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5202">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5202">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5203">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5203">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5204">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5204">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5205">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5205">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5206">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5206">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5207">De functie Func_germany_value_added_tax_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5207">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5208">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5208">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5209">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5209">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5210">De functie Func_germany_value_added_tax_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5210">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5215">btw #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5215">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5216">vat# mehrwertsteuer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5216">vat#  mehrwertsteuer</span></span>

## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5220">Licentienummer van Griekenland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5220">Greece driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5221">Deze entiteit van het type gevoelige informatie maakt deel uit van het type gevoelige informatie over het EU-rijbewijsnummer en is beschikbaar als een op zichzelf staand entiteit met gevoelige informatie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5221">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5222">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5222">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5223">negen cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5223">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5224">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5224">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5225">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5225">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5226">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5226">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5227">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5227">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5228">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5228">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5229">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5229">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5230">Met de normale  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5230">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5231">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5231">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="7a2200b5-aacf-4e3c-ab36-136d3e68b7da" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5357">Nationale Griekenland-id-kaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5357">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5358">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5358">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5359">Combinatie van 7-8 letters en cijfers plus een streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5359">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5360">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5360">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5361">Zeven letters en cijfers (oude notatie):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5361">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5362">EÃ©n letter (een letter van het Griekse alfabet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5362">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5363">Een streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5363">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5364">Zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5364">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5365">Acht letters en cijfers (nieuwe notatie):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5365">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5366">Twee letters waarvan het hoofdletterteken voorkomt in zowel het Griekse als het Latijnse alfabet (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5366">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5367">Een streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5367">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5368">Zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5368">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5369">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5369">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5370">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5370">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5371">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5371">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5372">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5372">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5373">De normale expressie Regex_greece_id_card inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5373">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5374">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_greece_id_card gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5374">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5375">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5375">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5376">De normale expressie Regex_greece_id_card inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5376">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
