- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5381">Griekse persoonlijke id-kaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5381">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5382">Griekse politie-id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5382">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5383">identiteitskaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5383">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5384">tautotita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5384">tautotita</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5385">ÏÎ±ÏÏÏÏÎ·ÏÎ±</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5385">ÏÎ±ÏÏÏÏÎ·ÏÎ±</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5386">ÏÎ±ÏÏÏÏÎ·ÏÎ±Ï</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5386">ÏÎ±ÏÏÏÏÎ·ÏÎ±Ï</span></span>


## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5387">Griekenland paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5387">Greece passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5388">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5388">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5389">Twee letters gevolgd door zeven cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5389">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5390">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5390">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5391">Twee letters gevolgd door zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5391">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5392">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5392">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5393">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5393">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5394">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5394">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5395">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5395">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5396">Met de normale  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5396">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5397">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5397">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5398">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de indeling `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` DD MMM YY (voorbeeld - 28 aug 19) of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` gevonden van</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5398">The regular expression `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM YY (Example - 28 Aug 19) or a keyword from `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5399">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5399">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5400">Met de normale  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5400">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5401">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5401">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7e65eb47-cdf9-4f52-8f90-2a27d5ee67e3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-social-security-number-amka"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5418">Griekenland-nummer voor sociale zekerheid (AMKA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5418">Greece Social Security Number (AMKA)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5419">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5419">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5420">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5420">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5421">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5421">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5422">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5422">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5423">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5423">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5424">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5424">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5425">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5425">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5426">Elf cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5426">Eleven digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5427">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5427">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5428">6 cijfers als geboortedatum YYMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5428">6 digits as date of birth YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5429">4 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5429">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5430">een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5430">a check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5431">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5431">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5432">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5432">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5433">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5433">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5434">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5434">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5435">Met de  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5435">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5436">Er wordt een  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5436">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5437">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5437">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5438">Met de  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5438">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Greece Social Security Number (AMKA) -->
      <Entity id="e39b03f4-50ea-41ae-af7a-a4b9539596ad" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5450">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5450">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5451">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5451">data loss prevention policies</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5454">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5454">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5455">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5455">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5456">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5456">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5457">Negen cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5457">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5458">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5458">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5459">Negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5459">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5460">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5460">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5461">Niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5461">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5462">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5462">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5463">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5463">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5464">Met de normale  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5464">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5465">Er wordt een  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5465">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml

      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5494">Hongkong-identiteitskaartnummer (HKID)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5494">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5495">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5495">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5496">Combinatie van 8-9 letters en cijfers plus optionele haakjes rond het uiteindelijke teken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5496">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5497">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5497">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5498">Combinatie van 8-9 letters:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5498">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5499">1-2 letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5499">1-2 letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5500">Zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5500">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5501">Het uiteindelijke teken (elk cijfer of de letter A), dat het controlecijfer is en optioneel tussen haakjes wordt omsloten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5501">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5502">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5502">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5503">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5503">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5504">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5504">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5505">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5505">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5506">De functie Func_hong_kong_id_card inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5506">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5507">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_hong_kong_id_card gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5507">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5508">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5508">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5509">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5509">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5510">De functie Func_hong_kong_id_card inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5510">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5511">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5511">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5551">Rijbewijsnummer van Hongarije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5551">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5552">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5552">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5553">Twee letters gevolgd door zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5553">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5554">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5554">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5555">Twee letters en zes cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5555">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5556">Twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5556">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5557">Zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5557">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5558">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5558">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5559">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5559">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5560">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5560">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5561">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5561">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5562">Met de normale  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5562">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5563">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5563">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5688">Persoonlijk identificatienummer van Hongarije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5688">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5689">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5689">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5690">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5690">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5691">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5691">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5692">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5692">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5693">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5693">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5694">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5694">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5695">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5696">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5696">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5697">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5697">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5698">11 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5698">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5699">EÃ©n cijfer dat overeenkomt met geslacht (1-man, 2-vrouw, andere getallen zijn ook mogelijk voor burgers die vÃ³Ã³r 1900 zijn geboren of voor burgers met een dubbele nationaliteit)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5699">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5700">Zes cijfers die overeenkomen met de geboortedatum (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5700">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5701">Drie cijfers die overeenkomen met een serieel getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5701">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5702">EÃ©n vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5702">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5703">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5703">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5704">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5704">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5705">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5705">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5706">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5706">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5707">Met de  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5707">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5708">Er wordt een  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5708">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5709">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5709">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5710">Met de  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5710">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5721">Paspoortnummer van Hongarije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5721">Hungary passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5722">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5722">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5723">Twee letters gevolgd door zes of zeven cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5723">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5724">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5724">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5725">Twee letters gevolgd door zes of zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5725">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5726">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5726">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5727">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5727">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5728">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5728">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5729">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5729">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5730">Met de normale  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5730">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5731">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5731">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5732">Met de normale expressie wordt datum gevonden in de indeling `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY (Voorbeeld - 01 MÃR/MAR 12) of een trefwoord uit `Keywords_eu_passport_date` wordt gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5732">The regular expression `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YY (Example - 01 MÃR/MAR 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5733">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5733">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5734">Met de normale  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5734">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5735">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5735">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5b483910-9aa7-4c99-9917-f4001464bda7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-taj"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5755">Hongarijese sociale zekerheidsnummer (TAJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5755">Hungary social security number (TAJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5756">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5756">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5757">Negen cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5757">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5758">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5758">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5759">Negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5759">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5760">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5760">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5761">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5761">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5762">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5762">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5763">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5763">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5764">Met de  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5764">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5765">Er wordt een  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5765">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5766">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5766">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5767">Met de  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5767">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Social Security Number (TAJ) -->
      <Entity id="0de78315-9537-47f5-95ab-b3e77eba3993" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5787">Btw-nummer van Hongarije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5787">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5788">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5788">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5789">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5789">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5790">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5790">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5791">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5791">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5792">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5792">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5793">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5793">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5794">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5794">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5795">10 cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5795">10 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5796">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5796">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5797">10 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5797">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5798">EÃ©n cijfer dat '8' moet zijn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5798">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5799">Acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5799">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5800">EÃ©n vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5800">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5801">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5801">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5802">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5802">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5803">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5803">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5804">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5804">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5805">Met de  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5805">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5806">Er wordt een  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5806">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5807">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5807">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5808">Met de  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5808">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5834">Btw-nummer in Hongarije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5834">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5835">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5835">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5836">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5836">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5837">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5837">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5838">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5838">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5839">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5839">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5840">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5840">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5841">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5841">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5842">Alfanumeriek patroon van 10 tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5842">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5843">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5843">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5844">Alfanumeriek patroon van 10 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5844">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5845">twee letters - HU of hu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5845">two letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5846">optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5846">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5847">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5847">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5848">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5848">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5849">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5849">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5850">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5850">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5851">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5851">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5852">Met de Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5852">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5853">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5853">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5854">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5854">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5855">Met de Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5855">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5869">India permanent accountnummer (PAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5869">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5870">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5870">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5871">10 letters of cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5871">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5872">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5872">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5873">10 letters of cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5873">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5874">Drie letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5874">Three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5875">Een letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5875">A letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5876">Een brief</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5876">A letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5877">Vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5877">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5878">Een letter die een alfabetisch controlecijfer is</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5878">A letter that is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5879">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5879">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5880">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5880">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5881">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5881">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5882">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5882">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5883">De normale expressie Regex_india_permanent_account_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5883">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5884">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_india_permanent_account_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5884">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5885">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5885">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5886">De normale expressie Regex_india_permanent_account_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5886">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
      <Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3520.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5891">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5891">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5892">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5892">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5893">12 cijfers met optionele spaties of streepjes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5893">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5894">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5894">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5895">12 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5895">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5896">Een cijfer dat niet 0 of 1 is</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5896">A digit which is not 0 or 1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5897">Drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5897">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5898">Een optionele spatie of streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5898">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5899">Vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5899">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5900">Een optionele spatie of streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5900">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5901">Het laatste cijfer, dat het controlecijfer is</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5901">The final digit, which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5902">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5902">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5903">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5903">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5904">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5904">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5905">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5905">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5906">Met de Func_india_aadhaar wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5906">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5907">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_india_aadhar gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5907">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5908">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5908">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5909">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5909">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5910">Met de Func_india_aadhaar wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5910">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5911">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5911">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5920">KTP-nummer (Indonesia Identity Card)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5920">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5921">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5921">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5922">16 cijfers met optionele perioden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5922">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5923">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5923">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5924">16 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5924">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5925">Provinciecode met twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5925">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5926">Een punt (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5926">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5927">Regency of stadscode met twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5927">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5928">Subdistrictcode met twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5928">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5929">Een punt (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5929">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5930">Zes cijfers in de indeling DDMMYY, die de geboortedatum zijn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5930">Six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5931">Een punt (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5931">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5932">Vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5932">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5933">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5933">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5934">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5934">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5935">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5935">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5936">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5936">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5937">De normale expressie Regex_indonesia_id_card inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5937">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5938">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_indonesia_id_card gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5938">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml

<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">

     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5944">Internationaal bankrekeningnummer (IBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5944">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5945">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5945">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5946">Landcode (twee letters) plus controlecijfers (twee cijfers) plus bbannummer (maximaal 30 tekens)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5946">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5947">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5947">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5948">Patroon moet de volgende gegevens bevatten:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5948">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5949">Landcode met twee letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5949">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5950">Twee controlecijfers (gevolgd door een optionele spatie)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5950">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5951">1-7 groepen van vier letters of cijfers (kunnen worden gescheiden door spaties)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5951">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5952">1-3 letters of cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5952">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5953">De notatie voor elk land is iets anders.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5953">The format for each country is slightly different.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5954">Het type IBAN-gevoelige informatie bestrijkt deze 60 landen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5954">The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5955">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5955">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5956">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5956">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5957">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5957">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5958">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5958">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5959">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5959">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5960">Met de Func_iban wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5960">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5961">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5961">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5968">Trefwoord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5968">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5969">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5969">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5970">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5970">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5971">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5971">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5972">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5972">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5973">Er wordt een trefwoord Dictionary_icd_10_updated gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5973">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5974">Er wordt een trefwoord Dictionary_icd_10_codes gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5974">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

```xml
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5977">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5977">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5978">Elke term uit de Dictionary_icd_10_updated woordenlijst met trefwoorden, die is gebaseerd op de internationale classificatie van ziektes, tiende revisie, klinische wijziging [(ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5978">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5979">Dit type zoekt alleen naar de term, niet naar de verzekeringscodes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5979">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5980">Elke term uit de Dictionary_icd_10_codes woordenlijst met trefwoorden, die is gebaseerd op de internationale classificatie van ziektes, tiende revisie, klinische wijziging [(ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5980">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-5981">Dit type zoekt alleen naar verzekeringscodes, niet naar de beschrijving.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-5981">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6000">IP-adres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6000">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6001">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6001">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6002">IPv4:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6002">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6003">Complex patroon dat bestand is voor opgemaakte (perioden) en niet-opgemaakte versies (geen perioden) van de IPv4-adressen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6003">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6004">IPv6:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6004">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6005">Complex patroon dat bestand is voor opgemaakte IPv6-getallen (inclusief dubbele punt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6005">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6006">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6006">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6007">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6007">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6008">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6008">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6009">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6009">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6010">Voor IPv6 heeft een DLP-beleid er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6010">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6011">De normale expressie Regex_ipv6_address inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6011">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6012">Er wordt geen trefwoord Keyword_ipaddress gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6012">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6013">Voor IPv4 heeft een DLP-beleid er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6013">For IPv4, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6014">De normale expressie Regex_ipv4_address inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6014">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6015">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_ipaddress gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6015">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6016">Voor IPv6 heeft een DLP-beleid er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6016">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6017">De normale expressie Regex_ipv6_address inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6017">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6018">Er wordt geen trefwoord Keyword_ipaddress gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6018">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6019">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6019">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6026">Nummer van ierlands rijbewijs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6026">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6027">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6027">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6028">Zes cijfers, gevolgd door vier letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6028">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6029">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6029">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6030">Zes cijfers en vier letters:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6030">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6031">Zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6031">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6032">Vier letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6032">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6033">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6033">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6034">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6034">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6035">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6035">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6036">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6036">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6037">Met de normale  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6037">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6038">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6038">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="e01bccd9-eb4d-414f-ace1-e9b6a4c4a2ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6162">Ierland paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6162">Ireland passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6163">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6163">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6164">Twee letters of cijfers gevolgd door zeven cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6164">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6165">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6165">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6166">Twee letters of cijfers, gevolgd door zeven cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6166">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6167">Twee cijfers of letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6167">Two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6168">Zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6168">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6169">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6169">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6170">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6170">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6171">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6171">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6172">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6172">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6173">Met de normale  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6173">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6174">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6174">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6175">Met de normale expressie wordt datum gevonden in de indeling `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Voorbeeld - 01 BEA/MEI 1988) of een trefwoord uit `Keywords_eu_passport_date` wordt gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6175">The regular expression `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6176">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6176">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6177">Met de normale  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6177">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6178">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6178">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="a2130f27-9ee2-4103-84f9-a6b1ee7d0cbf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
