## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6202">Nummer van persoonlijke openbare service (PPS) van Ierland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6202">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6203">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6203">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6204">Oude notatie (tot 31 december 2012):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6204">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6205">zeven cijfers gevolgd door 1-2 letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6205">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6206">Nieuwe notatie (1 januari 2013 en daarna):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6206">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6207">zeven cijfers gevolgd door twee letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6207">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6208">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6208">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6209">Oude notatie (tot 31 december 2012):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6209">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6210">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6210">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6211">Ã©Ã©n tot twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6211">one to two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6212">Nieuwe notatie (1 januari 2013 en daarna):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6212">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6213">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6213">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6214">een letter (niet case-sensitive) die een alfabetisch vinkje is</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6214">a letter (not case-sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6215">Een optionele letter in het bereik A-I of 'W'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6215">An optional letter in the range A-I, or âWâ</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6216">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6216">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6217">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6217">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6218">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6218">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6219">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6219">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6220">Met de Func_ireland_pps wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6220">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6221">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6221">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6222">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6222">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6223">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6223">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6224">Met de Func_ireland_pps wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6224">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6225">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6225">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6270">IsraÃ«ls bankrekeningnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6270">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6271">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6271">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6272">13 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6272">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6273">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6273">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6274">Opgemaakt:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6274">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6275">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6275">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6276">een streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6276">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6277">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6277">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6278">een streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6278">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6279">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6279">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6280">Niet-opgemaakt:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6280">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6281">13 opeenvolgende cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6281">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6282">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6282">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6283">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6283">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6284">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6284">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6285">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6285">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6286">De normale expressie Regex_israel_bank_account_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6286">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6287">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_israel_bank_account_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6287">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6294">Nationaal identificatienummer van IsraÃ«l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6294">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6295">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6295">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6296">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6296">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6297">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6297">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6298">negen opeenvolgende cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6298">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6299">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6299">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6300">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6300">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6301">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6301">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6302">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6302">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6303">De functie Func_israeli_national_id_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6303">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6304">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_Israel_National_ID gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6304">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6305">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6305">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6324">Nummer van het rijbewijs van ItaliÃ«</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6324">Italy driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6325">Deze entiteit van het type gevoelige informatie maakt deel uit van het type gevoelige informatie over het EU-rijbewijsnummer en is beschikbaar als een op zichzelf staand entiteit met gevoelige informatie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6325">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6326">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6326">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6327">een combinatie van 10 letters en cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6327">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6328">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6328">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6329">een combinatie van 10 letters en cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6329">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6330">Ã©Ã©n letter (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6330">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6331">de letter "A" of "V" (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6331">the letter "A" or "V" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6332">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6332">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6333">Ã©Ã©n letter (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6333">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6334">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6334">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6335">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6335">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6336">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6336">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6337">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6337">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6338">Met de normale `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6338">The regular expression `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6339">Een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6339">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
    <Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6466">Fiscale code van ItaliÃ«</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6466">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6467">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6467">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6468">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6468">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6469">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6469">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6470">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6470">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6471">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6471">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6472">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6472">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6473">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6473">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6474">een combinatie van letters en cijfers met 16 tekens in het opgegeven patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6474">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6475">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6475">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6476">Een combinatie van 16 tekens van letters en cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6476">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6477">drie letters die overeenkomen met de eerste drie medeklinkers in de familienaam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6477">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6478">drie letters die overeenkomen met de eerste, derde en vierde medeklinker in de voornaam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6478">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6479">twee cijfers die overeenkomen met de laatste cijfers van het geboortejaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6479">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6480">een letter die overeenkomt met de letter voor de maand van de geboorte: letters worden in alfabetische volgorde gebruikt, maar alleen de letters A tot en met E, H, L, M, P, R tot en met T worden gebruikt (januari is dus A en oktober is R)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6480">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birthâletters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (so, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6481">twee cijfers die overeenkomen met de dag van de maand van de geboorte: om onderscheid te maken tussen geslachten, wordt 40 toegevoegd aan de geboortedatum voor vrouwen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6481">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birthâin order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6482">vier cijfers die overeenkomen met de gebiedscode die specifiek is voor de gemeente waar de persoon is geboren (landcodes worden gebruikt voor het buitenland)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6482">four digits that correspond to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6483">Ã©Ã©n pariteitscijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6483">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6484">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6484">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6485">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6485">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6486">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6486">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6487">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6487">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6488">Met de  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6488">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6489">Er wordt een  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6489">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6490">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6490">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6491">Met de  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6491">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6526">ItaliÃ« paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6526">Italy passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6527">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6527">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6528">twee letters of cijfers gevolgd door zeven cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6528">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6529">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6529">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6530">twee letters of cijfers, gevolgd door zeven cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6530">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6531">twee cijfers of letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6531">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6532">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6532">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6533">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6533">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6534">niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6534">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6535">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6535">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6536">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6536">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6537">Met de normale  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6537">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6538">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6538">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6539">De normale expressie vindt datum in de indeling `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Voorbeeld - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) of een trefwoord uit `Keywords_eu_passport_date` wordt gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6539">The regular expression `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6540">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6540">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6541">Met de normale  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6541">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6542">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6542">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="39811019-4750-445f-b26d-4c0e6c431544" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6566">#A0 #A0 #A0 #A0 #A0 #A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6566">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6567">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6567">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6568">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6568">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6569">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6569">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6570">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6570">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6571">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6571">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6572">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6572">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6573">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6573">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6574">Alfanumeriek patroon van 13 tekens met optionele scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6574">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6575">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6575">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6576">13 tekens alfanumeriek patroon met optionele scheidingstekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6576">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6577">Ik of ik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6577">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6578">T of t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6578">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6579">optionele spatie, punt, afbreekstreester of komma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6579">optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6580">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6580">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6581">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6581">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6582">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6582">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6583">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6583">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6584">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6584">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6585">Met de Func_italy_value_added_tax_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6585">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6586">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6586">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6587">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6587">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6588">Met de Func_italy_value_added_tax_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6588">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6596">Japans bankrekeningnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6596">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6597">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6597">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6598">zeven of acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6598">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6599">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6599">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6600">bankrekeningnummer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6600">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6601">zeven of acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6601">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6602">bankrekeningstakcode:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6602">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6603">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6603">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6604">een spatie of streepje (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6604">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6605">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6605">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6606">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6606">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6607">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6607">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6608">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6608">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6609">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6609">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6610">Met de Func_jp_bank_account wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6610">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6611">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_jp_bank_account gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6611">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6612">Een van de volgende gegevens is waar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6612">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6613">De functie Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6613">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6614">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6614">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6615">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6615">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6616">Met de Func_jp_bank_account wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6616">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6617">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_jp_bank_account gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6617">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6664">Japans rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6664">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6665">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6665">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6666">12 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6666">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6667">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6667">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6668">12 opeenvolgende cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6668">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6669">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6669">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6670">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6670">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6671">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6671">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6672">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6672">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6673">Met de Func_jp_drivers_license_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6673">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6674">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6674">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6721">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6721">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6728">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6728">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6731">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6731">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

```xml

      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6752">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6752">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6758">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6758">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6759">een optionele spatie, punt of afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6759">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6762">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6762">Yes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6764">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6764">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

```xml

        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">

          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />

        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">

## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6781">Japan paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6781">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6782">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6782">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6783">twee letters gevolgd door zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6783">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6784">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6784">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6785">twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig) gevolgd door zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6785">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6786">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6786">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6787">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6787">No</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6789">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6789">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6790">De functie Func_jp_passport inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6790">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6791">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_jp_passport gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6791">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6810">12 letters en cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6810">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6811">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6811">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6812">12 letters en cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6812">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6813">twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6813">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6814">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6814">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6815">twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6815">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6816">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6816">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6817">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6817">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6818">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6818">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6819">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6819">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6820">De normale expressie Regex_jp_residence_card_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6820">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6821">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_jp_residence_card_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6821">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml

-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6830">Japans registratienummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6830">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6831">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6831">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6832">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6832">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6833">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6833">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6834">11 opeenvolgende cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6834">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6835">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6835">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6836">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6836">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6837">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6837">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6838">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6838">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6839">Met de Func_jp_resident_registration_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6839">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6840">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6840">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6853">Japans sociaal verzekeringsnummer (SIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6853">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6854">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6854">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6855">7-12 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6855">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6856">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6856">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6857">7-12 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6857">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6858">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6858">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6859">een afbreekstreester (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6859">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6860">zes cijfers OF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6860">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6861">7-12 opeenvolgende cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6861">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6862">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6862">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6863">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6863">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6864">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6864">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6865">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6865">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6866">Met de Func_jp_sin wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6866">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6867">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_jp_sin gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6867">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6868">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6868">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6869">Met de Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6869">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6870">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_jp_sin gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6870">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6891">Letlandse nummer van het rijbewijs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6891">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6892">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6892">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6893">drie letters gevolgd door zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6893">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6894">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6894">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6895">drie letters en zes cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6895">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6896">drie letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6896">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6897">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6897">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6898">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6898">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6899">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6899">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6900">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6900">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6901">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6901">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6902">Met de normale  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6902">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6903">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6903">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6904">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6904">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6905">Keywords_eu_driver is s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6905">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6906">driverlic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6906">driverlic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6907">driverlics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6907">driverlics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-6908">driverlicense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-6908">driverlicense</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7028">Persoonlijke code letland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7028">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7029">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7029">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7030">11 cijfers en een optioneel afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7030">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7031">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7031">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7032">Oude indeling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7032">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7033">11 cijfers en een afbreekstreester:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7033">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7034">zes cijfers die overeenkomen met de geboortedatum (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7034">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7035">een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7035">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7036">een cijfer dat overeenkomt met de eeuw van geboorte ("0" voor de 19e eeuw, "1" voor de 20e eeuw en "2" voor de 21e eeuw)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7036">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7037">vier cijfers, willekeurig gegenereerd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7037">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7038">Nieuwe indeling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7038">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7039">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7039">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7040">Twee cijfers "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7040">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7041">Negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7041">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7042">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7042">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7043">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7043">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7044">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7044">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7045">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7045">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7046">Met de  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` functie of regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7046">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7047">Er wordt een  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7047">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7048">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7048">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7049">Met de  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` functie of regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7049">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7112">Letland paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7112">Latvia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7113">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7113">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7114">twee letters of cijfers gevolgd door zeven cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7114">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7115">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7115">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7116">twee letters of cijfers, gevolgd door zeven cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7116">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7117">twee cijfers of letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7117">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7118">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7118">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7119">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7119">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7120">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7120">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7121">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7121">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7122">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7122">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7123">Met de normale  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7123">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7124">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7124">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7125">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de `Regex_eu_passport_date1` indeling DD.MM.YYYY of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden uit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7125">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7126">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7126">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7127">Met de normale  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7127">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7128">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7128">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="23ae25ec-cc28-421b-b77a-3054eadf1ede" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7151">Litouws rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7151">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7152">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7152">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7153">acht cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7153">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7154">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7154">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7155">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7155">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7156">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7156">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7157">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7157">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7158">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7158">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7159">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7159">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7160">Met de normale  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7160">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7161">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7161">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7286">Persoonlijke code litouwen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7286">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7287">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7287">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7288">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7288">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7289">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7289">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7290">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7290">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7291">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7291">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7292">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7292">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7293">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7293">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7294">11 cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7294">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7295">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7295">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7296">11 cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7296">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7297">Ã©Ã©n cijfer (1-6) dat overeenkomt met het geslacht en de eeuw van de geboorte van de persoon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7297">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7298">zes cijfers die overeenkomen met geboortedatum (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7298">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7299">drie cijfers die overeenkomen met het seriÃ«le getal van de geboortedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7299">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7300">een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7300">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7301">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7301">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7302">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7302">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7303">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7303">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7304">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7304">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7305">Met de  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7305">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7306">Er wordt een  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7306">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7307">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7307">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7308">Met de  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7308">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
