## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7343">Litouws paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7343">Lithuania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7344">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7344">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7345">acht cijfers of letters zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7345">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7346">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7346">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7347">acht cijfers of letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7347">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7348">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7348">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7349">niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7349">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7350">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7350">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7351">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7351">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7352">Met de normale  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7352">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7353">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7353">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7354">Met de normale `Regex_eu_passport_date3` expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de indeling DD MM YYYY of wordt een trefwoord van `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7354">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7355">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7355">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7356">Met de normale  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7356">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7357">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7357">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1b79900f-047b-4c3f-846f-7d73b5534bce" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7377">Luxemburgs rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7377">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7378">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7378">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7379">zes cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7379">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7380">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7380">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7381">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7381">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7382">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7382">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7383">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7383">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7384">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7384">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7385">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7385">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7386">Met de normale  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7386">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7387">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7387">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7513">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7513">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7514">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7514">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7515">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7515">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7516">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7516">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7517">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7517">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7518">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7518">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7519">13 cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7519">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7520">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7520">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7521">13 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7521">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7522">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7522">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7523">twee controlecijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7523">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7524">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7524">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7525">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7525">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7526">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7526">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7527">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7527">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7528">Met de  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7528">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7529">Er wordt een  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7529">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7530">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7530">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7531">Met de  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7531">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7554">Luxemburgs paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7554">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7555">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7555">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7556">acht cijfers of letters zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7556">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7557">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7557">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7558">acht cijfers of letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7558">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7559">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7559">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7560">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7560">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7561">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7561">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7562">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7562">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7563">Met de normale  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7563">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7564">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7564">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7565">Met de normale `Regex_eu_passport_date3` expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de indeling DD MM YYYY of wordt een trefwoord van `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7565">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7566">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7566">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7567">Met de normale  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7567">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7568">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7568">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="81d5c027-bed9-4421-91a0-3b2e55b3eb85" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7600">Luxemburgs nationaal identificatienummer (niet-natuurlijke personen)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7600">Luxemburg national identification number (non-natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7601">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7601">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7602">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7602">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7603">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7603">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7604">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7604">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7605">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7605">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7606">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7606">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7607">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7607">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7608">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7608">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7609">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7609">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7610">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7610">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7611">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7611">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7612">een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7612">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7613">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7613">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7614">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7614">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7615">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7615">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7616">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7616">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7617">Met de  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7617">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7618">Er wordt een  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7618">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7619">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7619">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7620">Met de  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7620">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7660">Nummer van maleisische identificatiekaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7660">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7661">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7662">12 cijfers met optionele afbreekstree streepjes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7662">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7663">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7664">12 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7664">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7665">zes cijfers in de notatie YYMMDD, de geboortedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7665">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7666">een streepje (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7666">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7667">Plaats-van-geboortecode met twee letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7667">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7668">een streepje (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7668">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7669">drie willekeurige cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7669">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7670">geslachtscode met Ã©Ã©n cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7670">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7671">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7671">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7672">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7672">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7673">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7673">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7674">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7674">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7675">De normale expressie Regex_malaysia_id_card_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7675">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7676">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7676">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7703">Malta-nummer van het rijbewijs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7703">Malta driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7704">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7704">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7705">Combinatie van twee tekens en zes cijfers in het opgegeven patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7705">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7706">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7706">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7707">combinatie van twee tekens en zes cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7707">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7708">twee tekens (cijfers of letters, niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7708">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7709">een spatie (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7709">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7710">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7710">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7711">een spatie (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7711">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7712">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7712">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7713">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7713">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7714">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7714">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7715">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7715">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7716">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7716">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7717">Met de normale  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7717">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7718">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7718">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7842">Malta-identiteitskaartnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7842">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7843">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7843">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7844">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7844">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7845">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7845">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7846">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7846">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7847">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7847">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7848">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7848">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7849">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7849">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7850">zeven cijfers, gevolgd door Ã©Ã©n letter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7850">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7851">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7851">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7852">zeven cijfers, gevolgd door Ã©Ã©n letter:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7852">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7853">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7853">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7854">Ã©Ã©n letter in 'M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z' (case insensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7854">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7855">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7855">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7856">Niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7856">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7857">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7857">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7858">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7858">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7859">Met de normale  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7859">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7860">Er wordt een  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7860">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7861">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7861">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7862">Met de normale  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7862">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7879">Malta-paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7879">Malta passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7880">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7880">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7881">zeven cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7881">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7882">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7882">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7883">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7883">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7884">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7884">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7885">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7885">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7886">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7886">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7887">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7887">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7888">Met de normale  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7888">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7889">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7889">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7890">Er wordt een `Keywords_eu_passport_date` trefwoord uit gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7890">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7891">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7891">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7892">Met de normale  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7892">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7893">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7893">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="b2b21198-48f9-4d13-b2a5-03969bff0fb8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7913">Malta-nummer voor belastingidentificatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7913">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7914">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7914">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7915">Voor Maltese nationals:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7915">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7916">zeven cijfers en Ã©Ã©n letter in het opgegeven patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7916">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7917">Niet-Maltese nationals en Maltese entiteiten:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7917">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7918">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7918">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7919">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7919">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7920">Maltese nationals: zeven cijfers en Ã©Ã©n letter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7920">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7921">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7921">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7922">Ã©Ã©n letter (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7922">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7923">Niet-Maltese nationals en Maltese entiteiten: negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7923">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7924">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7924">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7925">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7925">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7926">Niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7926">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7927">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7927">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7928">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7928">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7929">De regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  of zoekt inhoud die overeenkomt met het `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7929">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7930">Er wordt een  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7930">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7931">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7931">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7932">De regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` of zoekt inhoud die overeenkomt met het `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7932">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="medicare-beneficiary-identifier-mbi-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7965">Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI)-kaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7965">Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7966">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7966">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7967">alfanumeriek patroon van elf tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7967">eleven character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7968">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7968">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7969">Ã©Ã©n cijfer tussen 1 en 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7969">one digit between 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7970">Ã©Ã©n letter exclusief S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7970">one letter excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7971">Ã©Ã©n cijfer of letter exclusief S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7971">one digit or letter excluding S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7972">Ã©Ã©n cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7972">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7973">een optioneel afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7973">an optional Hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7974">Ã©Ã©n letter exclusief S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7974">one letter excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7975">Ã©Ã©n cijfer of letter exclusief S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7975">one digit or letter excluding S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7976">Ã©Ã©n cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7976">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7977">een optioneel afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7977">an optional Hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7978">twee letters exclusief S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7978">two letters excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7979">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7979">two digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7980">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7980">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7981">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7981">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7982">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7982">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7983">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7983">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7984">Met de normale  `Regex_mbi_card` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7984">The regular expression  `Regex_mbi_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7985">Er wordt een  `Keyword_mbi_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7985">A keyword from  `Keyword_mbi_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7986">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7986">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7987">Met de normale  `Regex_mbi_card` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7987">The regular expression  `Regex_mbi_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
    <!-- Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) card -->
      <Entity id="f753a286-f5cc-47e6-a592-4be25fd02591" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_mbi_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_mbi_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_mbi_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7992">hospik zijn begunstigden #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7992">medicare beneficiary #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7993">medicare beneficiary identifier</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7993">medicare beneficiary identifier</span></span>

## <a name="mexico-unique-population-registry-code-curp"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7997">Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7997">Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7998">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7998">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-7999">Alfanumeriek patroon van 18 tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-7999">18 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8000">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8000">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8001">vier letters (hoofdletters ongevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8001">four letters (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8002">zes cijfers die een geldige datum aangeven</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8002">six digits indicating a valid date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8003">een letter - H/h of M/m</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8003">a letter - H/h or M/m</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8004">twee letters die een geldige Mexicaanse staatscode aangeven</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8004">two letters indicating a valid Mexican state code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8005">drie letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8005">three letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8006">Ã©Ã©n letter of cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8006">one letter or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8007">Ã©Ã©n cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8007">one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8008">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8008">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8009">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8009">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8010">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8010">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8011">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8011">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8012">Met de  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8012">The function  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8013">Er wordt een  `Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8013">A keyword from  `Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8014">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8014">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8015">Met de  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8015">The function  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
    <!-- Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP) -->
      <Entity id="e905ad4d-5a74-406d-bf36-b1efca798af4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_mexico_population_registry_code" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_mexico_population_registry_code" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8036">BSN-nummer (Nederlandse burgerservice)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8036">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8037">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8037">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8038">acht of negen cijfers met optionele spaties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8038">eight or nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8039">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8039">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8040">acht-negen cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8040">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8041">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8041">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8042">een spatie (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8042">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8043">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8043">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8044">een spatie (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8044">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8045">twee-drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8045">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8046">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8046">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8047">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8047">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8048">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8048">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8049">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8049">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8050">De functie Func_netherlands_bsn inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8050">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8051">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_netherlands_bsn gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8051">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8052">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8052">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8072">uniek identiteitsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8072">uniek identiteitsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8073">uniek identificatienummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8073">unique identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8074">uniek identiteitsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8074">unique identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8075">uniqueidentityno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8075">uniqueidentityno#</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8076">Nederlands rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8076">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8077">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8077">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8078">tien cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8078">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8079">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8079">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8080">tien cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8080">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8081">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8081">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8082">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8082">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8083">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8083">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8084">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8084">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8085">Met de normale  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8085">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8086">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8086">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8214">Nederlands paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8214">Netherlands passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8215">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8215">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8216">negen letters of cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8216">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8217">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8217">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8218">negen letters of cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8218">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8219">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8219">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8220">niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8220">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8221">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8221">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8222">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8222">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8223">Met de normale  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8223">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8224">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8224">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8225">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de indeling `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Voorbeeld - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8225">The regular expression `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8226">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8226">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8227">Met de normale  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8227">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8228">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8228">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61786727-bafd-45f6-94d9-888d815e228e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8246">Btw-nummer van Nederland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8246">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8247">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8247">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8248">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8248">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8249">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8249">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8250">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8250">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8251">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8251">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8252">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8252">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8253">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8253">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8254">negen cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8254">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8255">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8255">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8256">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8256">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8257">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8257">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8258">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8258">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8259">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8259">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8260">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8260">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8261">Met de  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8261">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8262">Er wordt een  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8262">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8263">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8263">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8264">Met de  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8264">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8302">Btw-nummer voor Nederland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8302">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8303">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8303">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8304">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8304">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8305">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8305">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8306">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8306">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8307">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8307">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8308">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8308">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8309">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8309">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8310">Alfanumeriek patroon van 14 tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8310">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8311">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8311">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8312">Alfanumeriek patroon van 14 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8312">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8313">N of n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8313">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8314">L of l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8314">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8315">optionele spatie, punt of afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8315">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8316">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8316">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8317">optionele spatie, punt of afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8317">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8318">B of b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8318">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8319">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8319">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8320">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8320">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8321">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8321">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8322">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8322">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8323">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8323">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8324">De functie Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8324">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8325">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8325">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8326">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8326">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8327">De functie Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8327">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
