## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8336">Nieuw-Zeelands bankrekeningnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8336">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8337">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8337">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8338">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8338">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8339">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8339">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8340">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8340">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8341">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8341">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8342">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8342">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8343">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8343">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8344">14-cijferig tot 16-cijferig patroon met optioneel scheidingsteken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8344">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8345">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8345">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8346">14-cijferig tot 16-cijferig patroon met optioneel scheidingsteken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8346">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8347">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8347">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8348">een optioneel afbreekstreester of spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8348">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8349">drie tot vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8349">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8350">een optioneel afbreekstreester of spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8350">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8351">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8351">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8352">een optioneel afbreekstreester of spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8352">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8353">twee tot drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8353">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8354">een afbreekstreester of spatie met opties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8354">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8355">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8355">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8356">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8356">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8357">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8357">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8358">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8358">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8359">Met de Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8359">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8360">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8360">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8361">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8361">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8362">Met de Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8362">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zFealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8370">Nieuw-Zeelands rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8370">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8371">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8371">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8372">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8372">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8373">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8373">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8374">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8374">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8375">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8375">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8376">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8376">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8377">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8377">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8378">alfanumeriek patroon van acht tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8378">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8379">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8379">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8380">alfanumeriek patroon van acht tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8380">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8381">twee letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8381">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8382">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8382">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8383">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8383">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8384">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8384">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8385">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8385">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8386">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8386">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8387">De functie Func_newzealand_driver_license_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8387">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8388">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8388">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8389">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8389">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8390">De functie Func_newzealand_driver_license_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8390">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8457">Nieuw-Zeelandse belastingdienst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8457">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8458">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8458">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8459">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8459">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8460">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8460">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8461">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8461">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8462">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8462">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8463">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8463">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8464">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8464">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8465">acht of negen cijfers met optionele scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8465">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8466">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8466">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8467">acht of negen cijfers met optionele scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8467">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8468">twee of drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8468">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8469">een optionele spatie of afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8469">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8470">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8470">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8471">een optionele spatie of afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8471">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8472">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8472">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8473">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8473">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8474">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8474">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8475">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8475">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8476">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8476">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8477">De functie Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8477">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8478">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8478">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8479">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8479">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8480">De functie Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8480">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8482">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8482">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8483">ird no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8483">ird no.</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8489">Nieuw-Zeelands ministerie van gezondheid nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8489">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8490">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8490">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8491">drie letters, een spatie (optioneel) en vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8491">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8492">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8492">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8493">drie letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig), behalve 'I' en 'O'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8493">three letters (not case-sensitive) except 'I' and 'O'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8494">een spatie (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8494">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8495">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8495">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8496">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8496">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8497">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8497">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8498">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8498">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8499">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8499">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8500">Met de Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8500">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8501">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_nz_terms gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8501">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8502">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8502">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8503">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8503">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8504">Met de Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8504">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8505">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8505">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
    <Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
       </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-social-welfare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8519">Nieuw-Zeelandse sociale zekerheid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8519">New Zealand social welfare number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8520">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8520">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8521">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8521">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8522">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8522">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8523">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8523">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8524">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8524">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8525">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8525">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8526">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8526">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8527">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8527">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8528">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8528">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8529">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8529">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8530">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8530">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8531">een optioneel afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8531">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8532">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8532">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8533">een optioneel afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8533">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8534">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8534">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8535">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8535">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8536">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8536">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8537">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8537">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8538">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8538">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8539">De functie Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8539">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8540">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8540">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8541">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8541">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8542">De functie Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8542">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8550">Noorwegen-identificatienummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8550">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8551">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8551">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8552">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8552">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8553">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8553">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8554">11 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8554">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8555">zes cijfers in de indeling DDMMYY die de geboortedatum zijn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8555">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8556">individueel getal met drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8556">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8557">twee controlecijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8557">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8558">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8558">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8559">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8559">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8560">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8560">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8561">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8561">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8562">Met de Func_norway_id_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8562">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8563">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_norway_id_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8563">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8564">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8564">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8565">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8565">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8566">De functie Func_norway_id_numbe inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8566">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8567">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8567">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8576">Verenigd identificatienummer voor meerdere doeleinden in de Filipijnen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8576">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8577">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8577">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8578">12 cijfers gescheiden door afbreekstree streepjes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8578">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8579">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8579">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8580">12 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8580">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8581">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8581">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8582">een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8582">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8583">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8583">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8584">een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8584">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8585">Ã©Ã©n cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8585">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8586">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8586">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8587">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8587">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8588">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8588">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8589">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8589">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8590">De normale expressie Regex_philippines_unified_id inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8590">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8591">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_philippines_id gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8591">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8593">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8593">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8598">Licentienummer van Polen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8598">Poland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8599">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8599">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8600">14 cijfers met twee schuine schuine streep</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8600">14 digits containing two forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8601">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8601">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8602">14 cijfers en twee slashes vooruit:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8602">14 digits and two forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8603">vijf cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8603">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8604">een slash naar voren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8604">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8605">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8605">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8606">een slash naar voren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8606">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8607">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8607">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8608">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8608">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8609">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8609">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8610">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8610">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8611">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8611">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8612">Met de normale  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8612">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8613">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8613">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8737">Polen-identiteitskaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8737">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8738">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8738">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8739">drie letters en zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8739">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8740">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8740">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8741">drie letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig) gevolgd door zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8741">three letters (not case-sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8742">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8742">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8743">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8743">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8744">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8744">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8745">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8745">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8746">De functie Func_polish_national_id inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8746">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8747">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8747">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8748">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8748">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8753">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8753">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8755">Nazwa i nr dowodu toÅ¼samoÅci</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8755">Nazwa i nr dowodu toÅ¼samoÅci</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8756">DowÃ³d ToÅ¼samoÅci</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8756">DowÃ³d ToÅ¼samoÅci</span></span>

## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8759">Nationale Polen-id (PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8759">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8760">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8760">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8761">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8761">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8762">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8762">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8763">zes cijfers die de geboortedatum in de notatie YYMMDD vertegenwoordigen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8763">six digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8764">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8764">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8765">een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8765">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8766">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8766">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8767">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8767">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8768">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8768">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8769">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8769">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8770">Met de Func_pesel_identification_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8770">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8771">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_pesel_identification_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8771">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8772">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8772">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8773">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8773">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8774">Met de Func_pesel_identification_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8774">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8775">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8775">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">

        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8787">Polen paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8787">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8788">Deze entiteit van het type gevoelige informatie is opgenomen in het gevoelige informatietype EU-paspoortnummer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8788">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8789">Het is beschikbaar als een op zichzelf staand entiteit met gevoelige informatie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8789">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8790">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8790">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8791">twee letters en zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8791">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8792">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8792">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8793">Twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig) gevolgd door zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8793">Two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8794">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8794">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8795">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8795">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8796">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8796">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8797">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8797">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8798">Met de `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8798">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8799">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8799">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8800">Een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8800">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8801">Er wordt een `Keywords_eu_passport_date` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8801">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8802">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8802">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8803">Met de `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8803">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8804">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8804">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8805">Een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8805">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8806">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8806">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8807">Met de `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8807">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8808">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8808">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8834">Polen REGON-getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8834">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8835">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8835">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8836">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8836">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8837">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8837">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8838">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8838">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8839">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8839">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8840">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8840">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8841">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8841">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8842">9-cijferig of 14-cijferig getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8842">9-digit or 14-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8843">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8843">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8844">negen cijfers of 14-cijferig getal:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8844">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8845">negen cijfers of</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8845">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8846">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8846">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8847">afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8847">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8848">vijf cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8848">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8849">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8849">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8850">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8850">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8851">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8851">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8852">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8852">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8853">De functie Func_polish_regon_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8853">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8854">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_polish_regon_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8854">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8855">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8855">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8856">De functie Func_polish_regon_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8856">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8873">Btw-nummer polen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8873">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8874">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8874">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8875">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8875">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8876">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8876">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8877">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8877">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8878">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8878">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8879">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8879">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8880">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8880">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8881">11 cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8881">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8882">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8882">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8883">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8883">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8884">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8884">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8885">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8885">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8886">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8886">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8887">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8887">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8888">Met de  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8888">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8889">Er wordt een  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8889">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8919">Portugal burgerkaartnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8919">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8920">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8920">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8921">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8921">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8922">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8922">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8923">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8923">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8924">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8924">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8925">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8925">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8926">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8926">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8927">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8927">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8928">De normale expressie Regex_portugal_citizen_card inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8928">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8929">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_portugal_citizen_card gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8929">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8949">Portugese nummer van het rijbewijs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8949">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8950">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8950">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8951">twee patronen: twee letters gevolgd door 5-8 cijfers met speciale tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8951">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8952">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8952">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8953">Patroon 1: Twee letters gevolgd door 5/6 met speciale tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8953">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8954">Twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8954">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8955">Een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8955">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8956">Vijf of zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8956">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8957">Een spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8957">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8958">EÃ©n cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8958">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8959">Patroon 2: Een letter gevolgd door 6/8 cijfers met speciale tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8959">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8960">EÃ©n letter (niet zaakgevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8960">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8961">Een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8961">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8962">Zes of acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8962">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8963">Een spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8963">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8964">EÃ©n cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8964">One digit</span></span>

    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8965">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8965">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8966">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8966">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8967">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8967">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8968">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8968">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8969">Met de normale  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8969">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-8970">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-8970">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9102">Portugal paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9102">Portugal passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9103">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9103">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9104">Ã©Ã©n letter gevolgd door zes cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9104">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9105">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9105">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9106">Ã©Ã©n letter gevolgd door zes cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9106">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9107">Ã©Ã©n letter (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9107">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9108">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9108">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9109">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9109">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9110">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9110">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9111">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9111">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9112">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9112">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9113">Met de normale  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9113">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9114">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9114">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9115">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de `Regex_eu_passport_date1` indeling DD.MM.YYYY of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden uit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9115">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9116">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9116">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9117">Met de normale  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9117">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9118">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9118">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="080a52fd-a7bc-431e-b54d-51f08f59db11" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9145">Portugese belastingidentificatienummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9145">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9146">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9146">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9147">negen cijfers met optionele spaties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9147">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9148">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9148">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9149">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9149">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9150">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9150">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9151">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9151">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9152">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9152">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9153">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9153">three digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9154">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9154">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9155">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9155">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9156">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9156">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9157">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9157">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9158">Met de  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9158">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9159">Er wordt een  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9159">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9160">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9160">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9161">Met de  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9161">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9186">RoemeniÃ« rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9186">Romania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9187">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9187">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9188">Ã©Ã©n teken gevolgd door acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9188">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9189">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9189">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9190">Ã©Ã©n teken gevolgd door acht cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9190">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9191">Ã©Ã©n letter (niet case-sensitive) of cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9191">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9192">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9192">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9193">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9193">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9194">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9194">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9195">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9195">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9196">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9196">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9197">Met de normale  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9197">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9198">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9198">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
