## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9326">Roemeense persoonlijke numerieke code (CNP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9326">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9327">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9327">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9328">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9328">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9329">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9329">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9330">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9330">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9331">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9331">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9332">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9332">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9333">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9333">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9334">13 cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9334">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9335">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9335">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9336">Ã©Ã©n cijfer van 1-9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9336">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9337">zes cijfers die de geboortedatum (YYMMDD) vertegenwoordigen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9337">six digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9338">twee cijfers, die 01-52 of 99 kunnen zijn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9338">two digits, which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9339">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9339">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9340">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9340">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9341">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9341">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9342">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9342">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9343">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9343">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9344">Met de  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9344">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9345">Er wordt een  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9345">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9346">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9346">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9347">Met de  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9347">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9398">RoemeniÃ« paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9398">Romania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9399">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9399">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9400">acht of negen cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9400">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9401">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9401">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9402">acht of negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9402">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9403">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9403">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9404">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9404">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9405">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9405">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9406">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9406">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9407">Met de normale  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9407">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9408">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9408">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9409">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de indeling `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY (voorbeeld- 01 FEB/FEB 10) of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` uit gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9409">The regular expression `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (Example- 01 FEB/FEB 10) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9410">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9410">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9411">Met de normale  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9411">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9412">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9412">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5d31b90c-7fe2-4a76-a14b-767b8fd19d6c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9430">Rusland paspoortnummer binnenlands</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9430">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9431">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9431">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9432">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9432">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9433">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9433">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9434">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9434">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9435">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9435">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9436">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9436">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9437">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9437">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9438">10-cijferig getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9438">10-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9439">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9439">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9440">10-cijferig getal:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9440">10-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9441">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9441">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9442">een optionele spatie of afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9442">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9443">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9443">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9444">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9444">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9445">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9445">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9446">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9446">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9447">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9447">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9448">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9448">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9449">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9449">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9450">In de regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9450">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9451">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9451">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9468">Rusland paspoortnummer internationaal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9468">Russia passport number international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9469">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9469">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9470">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9470">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9471">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9471">communication compliance policies</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9475">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9475">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9477">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9477">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9478">negencijferig getal:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9478">nine-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9479">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9479">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9480">een optionele spatie of afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9480">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9481">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9481">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9482">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9482">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9483">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9483">No</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9485">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9485">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9486">In de regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9486">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9487">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9487">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9504">Nationale id van Saudi-ArabiÃ«</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9504">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9505">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9505">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9506">10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9506">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9507">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9507">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9508">10 opeenvolgende cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9508">10 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9509">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9509">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9510">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9510">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9511">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9511">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9512">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9512">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9513">De normale expressie Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9513">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9514">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9514">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9521">NRIC-nummer (National Registration Identity Card) van Singapore</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9521">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9522">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9522">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9523">negen letters en cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9523">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9524">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9524">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9525">negen letters en cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9525">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9526">de letter "F", "G", "S" of "T" (niet zaakgevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9526">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9527">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9527">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9528">een alfabetisch vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9528">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9529">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9529">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9530">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9530">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9531">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9531">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9532">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9532">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9533">De normale expressie Regex_singapore_nric inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9533">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9534">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_singapore_nric gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9534">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9535">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9535">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9536">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9536">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9537">De normale expressie Regex_singapore_nric inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9537">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9538">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9538">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9549">Slowakije-rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9549">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9550">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9550">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9551">Ã©Ã©n teken gevolgd door zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9551">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9552">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9552">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9553">Ã©Ã©n teken gevolgd door zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9553">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9554">Ã©Ã©n letter (niet case-sensitive) of cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9554">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9555">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9555">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9556">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9556">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9557">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9557">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9558">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9558">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9559">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9559">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9560">Met de normale  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9560">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9561">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9561">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9687">Persoonlijk nummer slowakije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9687">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9688">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9688">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9689">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9689">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9690">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9690">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9691">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9691">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9692">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9692">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9693">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9693">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9694">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9694">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9695">negen of tien cijfers met optionele backslash</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9695">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9696">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9696">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9697">zes cijfers die de geboortedatum vertegenwoordigen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9697">six digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9698">optionele slash (/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9698">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9699">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9699">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9700">een optioneel vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9700">one optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9701">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9701">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9702">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9702">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9703">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9703">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9704">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9704">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9705">Met de  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9705">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9706">Er wordt een  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9706">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9707">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9707">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9708">Met de  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9708">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9755">Slowakije paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9755">Slovakia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9756">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9756">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9757">Ã©Ã©n cijfer of letter gevolgd door zeven cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9757">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9758">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9758">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9759">Ã©Ã©n cijfer of letter (niet case-sensitive) gevolgd door zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9759">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9760">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9760">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9761">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9761">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9762">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9762">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9763">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9763">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9764">Met de normale  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9764">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9765">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9765">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9766">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de `Regex_eu_passport_date1` indeling DD.MM.YYYY of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden uit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9766">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9767">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9767">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9768">Met de normale  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9768">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9769">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9769">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="238e1f08-d80e-4793-af33-9b57918335b7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9791">Nummer van sloveens rijbewijs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9791">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9792">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9792">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9793">negen cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9793">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9794">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9794">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9795">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9795">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9796">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9796">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9797">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9797">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9798">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9798">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9799">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9799">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9800">Met de normale  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9800">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9801">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9801">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9928">SloveniÃ« Unique Master Citizen Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9928">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9929">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9929">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9930">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9930">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9931">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9931">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9932">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9932">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9933">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9933">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9934">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9934">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9935">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9935">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9936">13 cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9936">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9937">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9937">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9938">13 cijfers in het opgegeven patroon:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9938">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9939">zeven cijfers die overeenkomen met de geboortedatum (DDMMLLL) waarbij 'LLL' overeenkomt met de laatste drie cijfers van het geboortejaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9939">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9940">twee cijfers die overeenkomen met het geboortegebied "50"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9940">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9941">drie cijfers die overeenkomen met een combinatie van geslacht en serienummer voor personen die op dezelfde dag zijn geboren (000-499 voor mannen en 500-999 voor vrouwen)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9941">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9942">een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9942">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9943">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9943">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9944">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9944">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9945">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9945">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9946">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9946">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9947">Met de  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9947">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9948">Er wordt een  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9948">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9949">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9949">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9950">Met de  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9950">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9978">SloveniÃ« paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9978">Slovenia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9979">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9979">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9980">twee letters gevolgd door zeven cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9980">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9981">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9981">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9982">twee letters gevolgd door zeven cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9982">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9983">de letter 'P'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9983">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9984">Ã©Ã©n hoofdletter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9984">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9985">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9985">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9986">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9986">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9987">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9987">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9988">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9988">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9989">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9989">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9990">Met de normale  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9990">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9991">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9991">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9992">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de `Regex_eu_passport_date1` indeling DD.MM.YYYY of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden uit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9992">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9993">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9993">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9994">Met de normale  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9994">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-9995">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-9995">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="235b7976-7bbe-4df5-bb40-08678e749d1a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10018">Nummer van belastingidentificatie van SloveniÃ«</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10018">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10019">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10019">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10020">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10020">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10021">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10021">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10022">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10022">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10023">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10023">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10024">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10024">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10025">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10025">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10026">acht cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10026">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10027">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10027">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10028">Ã©Ã©n cijfer van 1-9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10028">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10029">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10029">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10030">een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10030">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10031">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10031">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10032">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10032">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10033">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10033">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10034">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10034">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10035">Met de  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10035">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10036">Er wordt een  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10036">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10037">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10037">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10038">Met de  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10038">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10039">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10039">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10040">Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10040">Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10062">Zuid-Afrika-identificatienummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10062">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10063">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10063">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10064">13 cijfers die spaties kunnen bevatten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10064">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10065">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10065">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10066">13 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10066">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10067">zes cijfers in de notatie YYMMDD, de geboortedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10067">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10068">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10068">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10069">een indicator voor een eencijferig burgerschap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10069">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10070">het cijfer '8' of '9'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10070">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10071">Ã©Ã©n cijfer, een checksum-cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10071">one digit, which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10072">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10072">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10073">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10073">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10074">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10074">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10075">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10075">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10076">Met de Func_south_africa_identification_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10076">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10077">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_south_africa_identification_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10077">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10078">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10078">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10084">Registratienummer voor inwoners van Zuid-Korea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10084">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10085">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10085">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10086">13 cijfers met een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10086">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10087">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10087">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10088">13 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10088">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10089">zes cijfers in de notatie YYMMDD, de geboortedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10089">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10090">een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10090">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10091">Ã©Ã©n cijfer dat wordt bepaald door de eeuw en het geslacht</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10091">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10092">viercijferige regio-van-geboortecode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10092">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10093">een cijfer dat wordt gebruikt om onderscheid te maken tussen personen voor wie de voorgaande getallen identiek zijn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10093">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10094">een vinkje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10094">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10095">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10095">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10096">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10096">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10097">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10097">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10098">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10098">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10099">De functie Func_south_korea_resident_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10099">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10100">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_south_korea_resident_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10100">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10101">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10101">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10102">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10102">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10103">De functie Func_south_korea_resident_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10103">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10104">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10104">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10112">Rijbewijsnummer van Spanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10112">Spain driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10113">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10113">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10114">acht cijfers gevolgd door Ã©Ã©n teken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10114">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10115">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10115">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10116">acht cijfers, gevolgd door Ã©Ã©n teken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10116">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10117">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10117">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10118">Ã©Ã©n cijfer of letter (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10118">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10119">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10119">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10120">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10120">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10121">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10121">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10122">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10122">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10123">De functie  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` of zoekt inhoud die overeenkomt met het `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10123">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10124">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10124">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10125">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10125">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10126">De functie  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` of zoekt inhoud die overeenkomt met het `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10126">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10261">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10261">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10262">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10262">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10263">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10263">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10264">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10264">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10265">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10265">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10266">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10266">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10267">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10267">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10268">acht cijfers gevolgd door Ã©Ã©n teken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10268">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10269">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10269">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10270">zeven cijfers gevolgd door Ã©Ã©n teken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10270">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10271">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10271">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10272">Een optionele spatie of afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10272">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10273">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10273">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10274">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10274">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10275">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10275">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10276">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10276">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10277">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10277">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10278">De functie  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` of zoekt inhoud die overeenkomt met het `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10278">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10279">Er wordt een  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10279">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10280">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10280">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10281">De functie  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` of zoekt inhoud die overeenkomt met het `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10281">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10305">Spanje paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10305">Spain passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10306">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10306">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10307">een combinatie van letters en getallen met acht of negen tekens zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10307">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10308">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10308">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10309">een combinatie van letters en cijfers met acht of negen tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10309">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10310">twee cijfers of letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10310">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10311">Ã©Ã©n cijfer of letter (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10311">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10312">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10312">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10313">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10313">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10314">Niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10314">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10315">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10315">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10316">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10316">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10317">Met de normale  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10317">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10318">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10318">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10319">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` indeling DD-MM-YYYY of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` uit gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10319">The regular expression `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD-MM-YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10320">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10320">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10321">Met de normale  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10321">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10322">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10322">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d17a57de-9fa5-4e9f-85d3-85c26d89686e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
