## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10351">Spanje sociaal-zekerheidsnummer (SSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10351">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10352">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10352">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10353">11-12 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10353">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10354">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10354">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10355">11-12 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10355">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10356">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10356">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10357">a forward slash (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10357">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10358">zeven tot acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10358">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10359">a forward slash (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10359">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10360">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10360">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10361">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10361">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10362">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10362">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10363">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10363">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10364">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10364">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10365">De functie Func_spanish_social_security_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10365">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10366">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10366">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- - <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10367">Er wordt een  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10367">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10368">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10368">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10369">De functie Func_spanish_social_security_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10369">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10370">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10370">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Spain SSN -->
    <Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10377">sociaal-zekerheidsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10377">social security number</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10379">Btw-nummer van Spanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10379">Spain tax identification number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10399">Ã©Ã©n hoofdletter (hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10399">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10403">Ã©Ã©n hoofdletter (hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10403">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10410">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10410">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10411">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10411">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10412">De functie  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` of zoekt inhoud die overeenkomt met het `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10412">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10413">Er wordt een  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10413">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10414">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10414">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10415">De functie  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` of zoekt inhoud die overeenkomt met het `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10415">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10446">SQL Server verbindingsreeks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10446">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10447">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10447">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10448">De tekenreeks 'Gebruikers-id', 'Gebruikers-id', 'uid' of 'UserId' gevolgd door de tekens en tekenreeksen die in het onderstaande patroon worden beschreven.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10448">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10449">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10449">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10450">de tekenreeks 'Gebruikers-id', 'Gebruikers-id', 'uid' of 'UserId'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10450">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10451">een combinatie van 1-200 kleine of hoofdletters, cijfers, symbolen, speciale tekens of spaties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10451">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10452">de tekenreeks 'Wachtwoord' of 'pwd' waarbij 'pwd' niet wordt voorafgegaan door een kleine letter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10452">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" isn't preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10453">een gelijkteken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10453">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10454">een teken dat geen dollarteken ($), procentsymbool (%), groter dan symbool (>), bij symbool (@), aanhalingsteken ("), puntkomma (;), linkerbrace([) of linker vierkante haak ({)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10454">any character that isn't a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10455">een combinatie van 7-128 tekens die geen puntkomma zijn (;), slash (/) of aanhalingsteken (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10455">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10456">een puntkomma (;) of aanhalingsteken (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10456">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10457">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10457">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10458">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10458">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10459">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10459">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10460">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10460">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10461">De normale expressie CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10461">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10462">Een trefwoord CEP_GlobalFilter wordt niet gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10462">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter isn't found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10463">De normale expressie CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon, wordt niet gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10463">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10464">In de CEP_CommonExampleKeywords wordt geen inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10464">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10465">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10465">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10466">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10466">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10467">some-password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10467">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10468">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10468">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10469">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10469">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10470">voorbeeld</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10470">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10471">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10471">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10472">(Houd er rekening mee dat deze trefwoorden technisch gezien met dit type gevoelige informatie worden geÃ¯dentificeerd met behulp van een gewone expressie, niet met een trefwoordlijst.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10472">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10473">Wachtwoord of pwd gevolgd door 0-2 spaties, een gelijkteken (=), 0-2 spaties en een sterretje (\*) -OF-</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10473">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) -OR-</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10474">Wachtwoord of pwd gevolgd door:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10474">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10475">Gelijkteken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10475">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10476">Minder dan symbool (<)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10476">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10477">Een combinatie van 1-200 tekens die hoofdletters of kleine letters, cijfers, een sterretje (\*), afbreekstreeping (-), onderstreping (_) of witruimteteken zijn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10477">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10478">Groter dan symbool (>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10478">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10479">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10479">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10492">Rijbewijsnummer van Zweden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10492">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10493">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10493">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10494">tien cijfers met een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10494">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10495">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10495">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10496">tien cijfers met een afbreekstreester:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10496">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10497">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10497">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10498">een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10498">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10499">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10499">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10500">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10500">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10501">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10501">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10502">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10502">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10503">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10503">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10504">Met de normale  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10504">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10505">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10505">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10638">Zweedse nationale id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10638">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10639">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10639">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10640">10 of 12 cijfers en een optioneel scheidingsteken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10640">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10641">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10641">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10642">10 of 12 cijfers en een optioneel scheidingsteken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10642">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10643">twee cijfers (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10643">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10644">Zes cijfers in datumnotatie YYMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10644">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10645">scheidingsteken van "-" of "+" (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10645">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10646">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10646">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10647">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10647">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10648">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10648">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10649">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10649">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10650">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10650">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10651">Met de `Func_swedish_national_identifier` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10651">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10652">Er wordt een `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` trefwoord uit gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10652">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10653">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10653">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10654">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10654">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10655">Met de `Func_swedish_national_identifier` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10655">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10656">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10656">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10675">Zweden paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10675">Sweden passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10676">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10676">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10677">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10677">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10678">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10678">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10679">acht opeenvolgende cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10679">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10680">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10680">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10681">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10681">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10682">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10682">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10683">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10683">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10684">met de normale expressie Regex_sweden_passport_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10684">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10685">een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keyword_sweden_passport` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10685">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10686">met de normale expressie wordt een datum gevonden in de indeling `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY (01 JAN/JAN 12) of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10686">the regular expression `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` finds a date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (01 JAN/JAN 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10687">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10687">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10688">met de normale expressie Regex_sweden_passport_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10688">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10689">een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keyword_sweden_passport` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10689">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10725">Btw-nummer zweden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10725">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10726">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10726">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10727">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10727">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10728">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10728">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10729">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10729">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10730">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10730">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10731">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10731">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10732">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10732">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10733">10 cijfers en een symbool in het opgegeven patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10733">10 digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10734">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10734">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10735">10 cijfers en een symbool:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10735">10 digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10736">zes cijfers die overeenkomen met de geboortedatum (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10736">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10737">een plusteken of minteken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10737">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10738">drie cijfers die het identificatienummer uniek maken op de volgende plaatsen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10738">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10739">voor getallen die vÃ³Ã³r 1990 zijn uitgegeven, wordt met het zevende en achtste cijfer het geboorteland of de in het buitenland geboren personen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10739">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10740">het cijfer in de negende positie geeft geslacht aan door oneven voor mannelijke of zelfs voor vrouwelijke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10740">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10741">een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10741">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10742">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10742">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10743">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10743">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10744">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10744">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10745">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10745">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10746">Met de  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10746">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10747">Er wordt een  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10747">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10748">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10748">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10749">Met de  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10749">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10775">SWIFT-code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10775">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10776">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10776">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10777">vier letters gevolgd door 5-31 letters of cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10777">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10778">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10778">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10779">vier letters gevolgd door 5-31 letters of cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10779">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10780">bankcode met vier letters (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10780">four-letter bank code (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10781">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10781">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10782">4-28 letters of cijfers (het basisrekeningnummer (BBAN))</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10782">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10783">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10783">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10784">Ã©Ã©n tot drie letters of cijfers (rest van de BBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10784">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10785">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10785">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10786">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10786">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10787">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10787">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10788">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10788">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10789">De normale expressie Regex_swift inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10789">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10790">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_swift gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10790">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10827">Zwitserland SSN AHV-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10827">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10828">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10828">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10829">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10829">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10830">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10830">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10831">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10831">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10832">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10832">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10833">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10833">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10834">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10834">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10835">13-cijferig getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10835">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10836">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10836">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10837">13-cijferig getal:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10837">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10838">drie cijfers - 756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10838">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10839">een optionele punt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10839">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10840">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10840">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10841">een optionele punt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10841">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10842">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10842">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10843">een optionele punt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10843">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10844">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10844">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10845">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10845">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10846">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10846">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10847">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10847">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10848">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10848">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10849">Met de Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10849">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10850">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10850">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10851">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10851">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10852">Met de Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10852">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10873">Taiwan national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10873">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10874">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10874">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10875">Ã©Ã©n letter (in het Engels) gevolgd door negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10875">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10876">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10876">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10877">een letter (in het Engels) gevolgd door negen cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10877">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10878">Ã©Ã©n letter (in het Engels, niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10878">one letter (in English, not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10879">het cijfer '1' of '2'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10879">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10880">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10880">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10881">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10881">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10882">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10882">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10883">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10883">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10884">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10884">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10885">Met de Func_taiwanese_national_id wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10885">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10886">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_taiwanese_national_id gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10886">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10887">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10887">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10888">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10888">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10889">Met de Func_taiwanese_national_id wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10889">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10890">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10890">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10907">Taiwan paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10907">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10908">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10908">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10909">biometrisch paspoortnummer: negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10909">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10910">niet-biometrisch paspoortnummer: negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10910">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10911">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10911">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10912">biometrisch paspoortnummer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10912">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10913">het teken '3'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10913">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10914">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10914">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10915">niet-biometrisch paspoortnummer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10915">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10916">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10916">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10917">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10917">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10918">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10918">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10919">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10919">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10920">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10920">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10921">De normale expressie Regex_taiwan_passport inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10921">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10922">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_taiwan_passport gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10922">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10933">Taiwan-ingezeten certificaatnummer (ARC/TARC)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10933">Taiwan-resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10934">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10934">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10935">10 letters en cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10935">10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10936">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10936">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10937">10 letters en cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10937">10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10938">twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10938">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10939">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10939">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10940">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10940">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10941">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10941">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10942">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10942">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10943">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10943">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10944">De normale expressie Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10944">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10945">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10945">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10959">Thaise bevolkingsidentificatiecode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10959">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10960">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10960">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10961">13 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10961">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10962">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10962">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10963">13 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10963">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10964">eerste cijfer is geen nul of negen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10964">first digit isn't zero or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10965">12 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10965">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10966">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10966">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10967">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10967">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10968">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10968">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10969">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10969">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10970">Met de Func_Thai_Citizen_Id wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10970">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10971">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10971">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10972">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10972">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10973">Met de Func_Thai_Citizen_Id wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10973">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10982">Turks nationaal identificatienummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10982">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10983">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10983">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10984">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10984">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10985">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10985">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10986">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10986">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10987">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10987">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10988">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10988">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10989">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10989">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10990">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10990">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10991">De functie Func_Turkish_National_Id inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10991">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10992">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_Turkish_National_Id gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10992">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10993">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10993">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-10994">De functie Func_Turkish_National_Id inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-10994">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11001">VK</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11001">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11002">rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11002">driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11003">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11003">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11004">Combinatie van 18 letters en cijfers in de opgegeven notatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11004">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11005">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11005">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11006">18 letters en cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11006">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11007">Vijf letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig) of het cijfer '9' in plaats van een letter.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11007">Five letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11008">EÃ©n cijfer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11008">One digit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11009">Vijf cijfers in de datumnotatie MMDDY voor geboortedatum.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11009">Five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11010">Het zevende teken wordt verhoogd met 50 als het stuurprogramma een vrouw is. voor examen, 51 tot 62 in plaats van 01 tot 12.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11010">The seventh character is incremented by 50 if driver is female; for exampe, 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11011">Twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig) of het cijfer '9' in plaats van een letter.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11011">Two letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11012">Vijf cijfers.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11012">Five digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11013">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11013">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11014">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11014">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11015">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11015">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11016">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11016">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11017">Met de `Func_uk_drivers_license` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11017">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11018">Er wordt een `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11018">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11019">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11019">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11020">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11020">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11021">Met de `Func_uk_drivers_license` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11021">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11022">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11022">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11143">VK</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11143">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11144">kieslijstnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11144">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11145">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11145">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11146">twee letters gevolgd door 1-4 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11146">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11147">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11147">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11148">twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig) gevolgd door 1-4 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11148">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11149">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11149">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11150">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11150">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11151">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11151">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11152">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11152">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11153">De normale expressie Regex_uk_electoral inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11153">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11154">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_uk_electoral gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11154">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11155">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11155">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11156">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11156">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11157">raadsnominatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11157">council nomination</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11158">formulier voor voordracht</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11158">nomination form</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11159">kiesregister</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11159">electoral register</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11160">kieslijst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11160">electoral roll</span></span>

   
## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11161">VK</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11161">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11162">national health service number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11162">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11163">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11163">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11164">10-17 cijfers gescheiden door spaties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11164">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11165">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11165">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11166">10-17 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11166">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11167">3 of 10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11167">either 3 or 10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11168">een spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11168">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11169">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11169">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11170">een spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11170">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11171">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11171">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11172">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11172">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11173">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11173">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11174">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11174">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11175">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11175">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11176">De functie Func_uk_nhs_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11176">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11177">Een van de volgende gegevens is waar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11177">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11178">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_uk_nhs_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11178">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11179">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11179">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11180">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11180">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11181">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11181">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11199">VK</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11199">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11200">national insurance number (NINO)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11200">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11201">Deze entiteit van het type gevoelige informatie maakt deel uit van het eu-nationale identificatienummer voor gevoelige informatie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11201">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11202">Het is beschikbaar als een op zichzelf staand entiteit met gevoelige informatie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11202">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11203">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11203">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11204">zeven tekens of negen tekens gescheiden door spaties of streepjes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11204">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11205">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11205">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11206">twee mogelijke patronen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11206">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11207">twee letters (geldige NINOs gebruiken alleen bepaalde tekens in dit voorvoegsel, dat door dit patroon wordt gevalideerd; niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11207">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11208">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11208">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11209">'A', 'B', 'C' of 'D' (net als het voorvoegsel zijn alleen bepaalde tekens toegestaan in het achtervoegsel; niet hoofd- en hoofdschruf)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11209">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11210">OF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11210">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11211">twee letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11211">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11212">een spatie of streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11212">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11213">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11213">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11214">een spatie of streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11214">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11215">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11215">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11216">een spatie of streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11216">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11217">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11217">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11218">een spatie of streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11218">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11219">'A', 'B', 'C' of 'D'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11219">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11220">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11220">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11221">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11221">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11222">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11222">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11223">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11223">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11224">De functie Func_uk_nino inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11224">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11225">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_uk_nino gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11225">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11226">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11226">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11227">De functie Func_uk_nino inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11227">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```
