## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11249">VK</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11249">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11250">Uniek referentienummer voor belastingbetalers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11250">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11251">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11251">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11255">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11255">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11256">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11256">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11257">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11257">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11258">10 cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11258">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11259">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11259">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11260">10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11260">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11261">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11261">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11262">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11262">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11263">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11263">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11264">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11264">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11265">Met de  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11265">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11266">Er wordt een  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11266">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11286">Amerikaans bankrekeningnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11286">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11287">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11287">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11288">6-17 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11288">6-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11289">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11289">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11290">6-17 opeenvolgende cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11290">6-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11291">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11291">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11292">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11292">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11293">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11293">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11294">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11294">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11295">De normale expressie Regex_usa_bank_account_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11295">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11296">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_usa_Bank_Account gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11296">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11326">Amerikaans nummer van het rijbewijs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11326">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11327">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11327">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11328">Is afhankelijk van de status</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11328">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11329">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11329">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11330">is afhankelijk van de staat, bijvoorbeeld New York:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11330">depends on the state - for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11331">negen cijfers die zijn opgemaakt, zoals ddd ddd ddd, komen overeen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11331">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11332">negen cijfers zoals ddddddddd komen niet overeen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11332">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11333">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11333">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11334">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11334">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11335">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11335">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11336">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11336">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11337">De functie Func_new_york_drivers_license_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11337">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11338">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11338">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11339">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_us_drivers_license gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11339">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11340">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11340">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11341">De functie Func_new_york_drivers_license_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11341">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11342">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11342">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11343">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11343">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11344">Er wordt geen trefwoord Keyword_us_drivers_license gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11344">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11442">Amerikaans individueel nummer voor het identificeren van belastingbetalers (ITIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11442">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11443">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11443">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11444">negen cijfers die beginnen met een '9' en een '7' of '8' bevatten als het vierde cijfer, eventueel opgemaakt met spaties of streepjes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11444">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11445">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11445">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11446">opgemaakt:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11446">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11447">het cijfer '9'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11447">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11448">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11448">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11449">een spatie of streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11449">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11450">een '7' of '8'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11450">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11451">een cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11451">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11452">een spatie of streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11452">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11453">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11453">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11454">niet-opgemaakt:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11454">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11455">het cijfer '9'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11455">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11456">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11456">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11457">een '7' of '8'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11457">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11458">vijf cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11458">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11459">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11459">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11460">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11460">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11461">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11461">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11462">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11462">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11463">Met de Func_formatted_itin wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11463">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11464">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_itin gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11464">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11465">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11465">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11466">Met de Func_unformatted_itin wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11466">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11467">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_itin gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11467">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11468">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11468">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11469">Met de functie Func_formatted_itin of Func_unformatted_itin wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11469">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11470">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11470">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11471">Keyword_itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11471">Keyword_itin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11474">belastingidentificatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11474">tax identification</span></span>

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11484">Amerikaans sociaal-zekerheidsnummer (SSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11484">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11485">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11485">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11486">negen cijfers, die zich mogelijk in een opgemaakt of niet-opgemaakt patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11486">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11487">Als een SSN vÃ³Ã³r medio 2011 is uitgegeven, heeft een SSN een sterke opmaak waarbij bepaalde delen van het getal binnen bepaalde bereik moeten vallen om geldig te zijn (maar er is geen checksum).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11487">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11488">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11488">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11489">Vier functies zoeken naar SSN's in vier verschillende patronen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11489">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11490">Func_ssn vindt SSN's met een sterke opmaak van vÃ³Ã³r 2011 die zijn opgemaakt met streepjes of spaties (ddd-ddddd OR ddd ddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11490">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11491">Func_unformatted_ssn vindt SSN's met een sterke opmaak van vÃ³Ã³r 2011 die niet is opgemaakt als negen opeenvolgende cijfers (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11491">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11492">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn zoekt naar SSN's na 2011 die zijn opgemaakt met streepjes of spaties (ddd-dd-dddd OF ddd dd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11492">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11493">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn wordt na 2011 SSN's gevonden die niet zijn opgemaakt als negen opeenvolgende cijfers (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11493">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11494">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11494">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11495">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11495">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11496">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11496">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11497">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11497">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11498">De functie Func_ssn inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11498">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11499">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_ssn gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11499">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11500">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11500">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11501">Met de Func_unformatted_ssn wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11501">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11502">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_ssn gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11502">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11503">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11503">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11504">Met de Func_randomized_formatted_ssn wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11504">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11505">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_ssn gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11505">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11506">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11506">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11507">De functie Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11507">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11508">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_ssn gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11508">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11509">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11509">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11523">V.S. / VK</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11523">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11524">paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11524">passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11525">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11525">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11526">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11526">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11527">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11527">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11528">negen opeenvolgende cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11528">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11529">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11529">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11530">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11530">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11531">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11531">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11532">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11532">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11533">De functie Func_usa_uk_passport inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11533">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11534">Een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11534">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11535">Er wordt een `Keywords_eu_passport_date` trefwoord uit gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11535">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11536">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11536">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11537">De functie Func_usa_uk_passport inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11537">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11538">Een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11538">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. / U.K. Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11555">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11555">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>

## <a name="ukraine-passport-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11579">Oekraine paspoort internationaal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11579">Ukraine passport international</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11581">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11581">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11582">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11582">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11583">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11583">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11584">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11584">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11585">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11585">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11586">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11586">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11587">alfanumeriek patroon met acht tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11587">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11588">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11588">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11589">alfanumeriek patroon met acht tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11589">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11595">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11595">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11596">In de regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11596">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="bb49a-11597">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="bb49a-11597">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
